lines.title: Pure Creativity without motive
lines.subtitle: Gifted with creativity.
lines.text: Your self-expression is often impulsive and also wholesome when it is effortless.

exaltation.advice: Reflecting the Moon’s phases, your self-expression finds its own natural timing.

detriment.advice: Creative brilliance is hard to restrain. Learning patience is essential for you.

lines.title: Being in Accord
lines.subtitle: Aligning with universal truths.
lines.text: Creativity is a natural expression always subject to, and altered by your personal agendas.

exaltation.advice: Creative self-expression intensifies by applying your aspiration and values.

detriment.advice: Your full creative potential can be limiting when you express only desires and passion.

lines.title: Creative Thrust
lines.subtitle: Applying yourself to your best ability.
lines.text: Your creativity is hard to contain and direct, and is affected by any material consideration.

exaltation.advice: You push for self-expression in all areas of life, regardless of any constraints.

detriment.advice: Materialism invariably affects the quality of your creativity. Being diligent is important.

lines.title: The Artist Alone
lines.subtitle: Finding yourself in the middle of the Creative process.
lines.text: A flow of personal creativity brings you intimate contact with Existence.

exaltation.advice: Your creativity develops and flowers best away from outside influences.

detriment.advice: Trying to influence others directly with your creativity. will actually limit it’s potential.

lines.title: Magnetic Creativity
lines.subtitle: A means to fascinate people with your creative pursuits.
lines.text: Your creativity is hard for others to ignore, even if no one grasps what is really happening!

exaltation.advice: Exuding creativity in every aspect of your life, you naturally fascinate other people.

detriment.advice: Eccentricity may attract attention, but it will eventually limit your truly creative potentials.

lines.title: ”The Hollow Bamboo”
lines.subtitle: The artist as a medium through whom Existence plays Her song.
lines.text: Whether you can embrace this or not: creativity is its own resource and the artist the medium.

exaltation.advice: Through medication and detachment you give form to the freest expressions of creativity.

detriment.advice: Self-consciousness may lead you to be frustrated in your creative endeavors.

lines.title: Crystal Vision
lines.subtitle: Receptive to guidance that accord with the beauty of existence.
lines.text: Your inner knowing comes through appreciation of the beauty and beauty and fragility of life.

exaltation.advice: You align yourself with high ideals through your sensibility to life.

detriment.advice: You try to force predetermined outcomes despite your inborn wisdom.

lines.title: Being Gifted
lines.subtitle: Natural access to an intelligence that often defies logical explanation.
lines.text: You access an inner sense of knowing beyond the scope of any accumulated knowledge.

exaltation.advice: Your natural gift for knowing must sooner or later be acknowledged.

detriment.advice: With an ability to excel, you tend to seek power through your knowledge.

lines.title: Patient Knowing
lines.subtitle: Acknowledging that never ceases giving lessons.
lines.text: Aligning within your own particular way brings special rewards, in your own perfect timing.

exaltation.advice: By being receptive you learn to adapt to every conceivable experience that life offers you.

detriment.advice: Your inspiration and powerful sense of knowing is impulsive and often demands expression.

lines.title: Concealing
lines.subtitle: Knowing much but revealing only the essential.
lines.text: There is universal and learnable knowledge but some things are impossible to transfer clearly.

exaltation.advice: Sometimes in the highest interests of harmony your knowledge does not need to be expressed.

detriment.advice: A tendency you have to be unable to keep silent brings the likelihood of you causing upset.

lines.title: Strategy
lines.subtitle: Biding your time until action is merited.
lines.text: You interconnect to every asset life offers, whether others can or need to be included or not.

exaltation.advice: When ready to direct you communicate clearly and use all available resources wisely.

detriment.advice: A self-centered process leaves you overlooking others and their potential contribution.

lines.title: Being Preoccupied
lines.subtitle: Tunnel Vision limits your capacity to expand fully.
lines.text: Whether you can embrace this or not: creativity is its own resource and artist is the medium.

exaltation.advice: Your mind never knows for sure, so it is essential to trust and relax into your own Authority.

detriment.advice: Security can become an excuse or “reason” for everything, even to betray your own ideals.

lines.title: Being Organized
lines.subtitle: Embracing the whole picture in front of you.
lines.text: Confusion is cleared up through your dispassionate review, not through worry and anxiety.

exaltation.advice: Trusting that confusion becomes clarity, you keep in sight of all potential outcomes.

detriment.advice: Mental muddles will compel you to try many disorganized and scattered endeavors.

lines.title: Maturing
lines.subtitle: Diligent application.
lines.text: Trusting your own personal evolution or tending to rely on the advice and ways of others.

exaltation.advice: You have the potential for personal growth and maturation if you trust your own ways.

detriment.advice: Randomly trusting or disregarding others’ advice leads you to a personal instability.

lines.title: Scrutinizing
lines.subtitle: Finding out what works and what does not.
lines.text: Prospering in life comes about through you recognizing evolutionary laws and their timing.

exaltation.advice: New ways are more easily introduced when you seek the most able and willing assistance.

detriment.advice: If you disregard the law of “survival of the fittest” your ideals will eventually suffer.

lines.title: Associating
lines.subtitle: Realigning with your real sense of purpose.
lines.text: Your self-assurance and trust, or their lack, allow or reject valuable guidance and company.

exaltation.advice: Your heartfelt attunement with others attracts encouragement and ensures a new order.

detriment.advice: If you are impatient in seeking nourishment and guidance you will often be rejected.

lines.title: Interpreting
lines.subtitle: Detaching from anticipated results when implementing a new order.
lines.text: If organizing anything new, there is the possibility of your intention being misinterpreted.

exaltation.advice: You assured individual stance withstands any disagreements and establishes order.

detriment.advice: You can easily become confused in your attempts to reconcile others’ problems.

lines.title: Renewing
lines.subtitle: In all new endeavors remember to keep realigning with your vision.
lines.text: There is always a potential to get caught up in fear and despair, where orderliness is forgotten.

exaltation.advice: You have an inner appreciation that ordering is a process that unfolds in its own way.

detriment.advice: Forgetting your clear intention can lead you to become confused and even depressed.

lines.title: Learning
lines.subtitle: Good timing is a. gift enhances solving all problems.
lines.text: You are always learning the art of recognizing when and where to provide mental solutions.

exaltation.advice: Acknowledging that profound solutions are available when you really need them.

detriment.advice: You tend to implement resolutions that ignore the natural timing to proble solving.

lines.title: Kindness
lines.subtitle: Recognizing that everyone has their own strengths and weaknesses.
lines.text: Logic can be used in many ways and you may include others in your understanding or not.

exaltation.advice: You come to appreciate that not everyone is going to understand your viewpoints.

detriment.advice: In a hurry, you might sometimes take advantage of other people’s slowness and disorder.

lines.title: Carelessness
lines.subtitle: A love of solution that may not actually solve problem.
lines.text: lf you allow it, a lazy mind will settle for the easiest solution rather than a relevant one.

exaltation.advice: You have a potential to use solutions rather for appearances rather than for effectiveness.

detriment.advice: Any tendency for diminished responsibility will lead you to meager accomplishments.

lines.title: Justifying
lines.subtitle: A busy mind that somehow is going to find an answer for everything.
lines.text: You can validate solutions for any scenario, sometimes going beyond any normal level of logic.

exaltation.advice: You find mental formulas, realistic or not, for every conceivable life situation.

detriment.advice: If you try applying mental solution for everything you’ll be frustrated when they don’t work!

lines.title: Being Broad-minded
lines.subtitle: Solving difficulties by being open to any and all resources.
lines.text: With a gift for problem solving you sometimes diminish others’ lack of ability to understand.

exaltation.advice: You have a cleverness for solving problems that is teachable to others.

detriment.advice: You are potentially cynical if you have to tailor your solution to meet others’ approval.

lines.title: Cleverness
lines.subtitle: Too clever for your own good” if you think your mental solutions endure!
lines.text: Unless disciplined your mind always tries to dominate life with its solution mechanism.

exaltation.advice: Mental discipline comes through your patience, awareness and applied experimentation.

detriment.advice: You can be arrogant even though you realize the shortcomings of your mental solution.

lines.title: Attuning
lines.subtitle: Persistently paying attention to your own inner timing.
lines.text: Life is full of distractions that can pull you away from your inherently natural timing.

exaltation.advice: You have the intent to keep to your own fixer rhythms, regardless of diversions.

detriment.advice: Falling to honor your own timing and giving in to imposed demands brings exhaustion.

lines.title: Finding Tranquility
lines.subtitle: Watchfully waiting for your own right timing.
lines.text: All actions have an appropriate timing, and you are either comfortable with waiting, or not.

exaltation.advice: Trusting your own nature to be comfortable with your own pace in all areas of life.

detriment.advice: Driving for transportation you suffer anxiety with fixer rhythms and cause disruptions.

lines.title: Being Nervous
lines.subtitle: The potential to become anxious when it seems nothing is happening.
lines.text: All waiting has an implied helplessness that can prompt you to act without clear motivation.

exaltation.advice: Your imagination eases the monotony of dull routines and relieves the stress of waiting.

detriment.advice: A constantly shifting restlessness upsets your inner timing inclining you to be incautious.

lines.title: Biding Time
lines.subtitle: Patience that leaves you open to find worthwhile opportunities.
lines.text: Watching prevailing conditions and weighing your options until opportunities appear.

exaltation.advice: You outlast times of unrest and respond to each situation in life with your innovativeness.

detriment.advice: Attempting to force the pace of life, you will lose opportunities in predictable sequences.

lines.title: Inner Balancing
lines.subtitle: Innocent acceptance of life’s rhythms ia a vital quality of Being.
lines.text: Seeing what life offers can be a delight, or if you insist life should bring more, a challenge.

exaltation.advice: Your inner calm and assurance accepts whatever Existence presents to you.

detriment.advice: You may overlook finding joy in simple things adopt demands for change.

lines.title: Releasing!
lines.subtitle: Letting go of any pressures involved in waiting by trusting.
lines.text: In all growth, there is pressure Honoring natural rhythms enables your readiness. for response.

exaltation.advice: By accepting your natural timing, despite pressures, growth will often come through Grace.

detriment.advice: You tend to find it hard to release old comforts, and relationships.

lines.title: Negotiating
lines.subtitle: The easiest time to resolve a disagreement is before it starts.
lines.text: With any potential emotional upset, biding your time is often the most intelligent solution.

exaltation.advice: You have the emotional power and growing maturity to be intimate in all phases of life.

detriment.advice: Emotional insecurity in times of intimacy triggers you to attempt to intellectualize feelings.

lines.title: Sensibility
lines.subtitle: Conflicts easily erupt from a personal imbalance
lines.text: In all emotionally charged situations, you find resolution with or without confronting others.

exaltation.advice: Trusting your natural sensitivity you achieve an inner harmony that facilitates resolution.

detriment.advice: Your touchy nature often attempts to reserve conflict though emotional outburst.

lines.title: Having Reservations
lines.subtitle: Resolutions often happen by playing a passive role.
lines.text: Achieving emotional clarity comes by making commitments with alertness.

exaltation.advice: The depth and quality of your feelings enriches passion, union and intimacy.

detriment.advice: Sensitive to all power struggles, you may be tempted to reject intimacy altogether.

lines.title: Promoting Peace
lines.subtitle: A naturally strong emotional presence promotes enduring resolutions.
lines.text: In all emotional interactions, you can easily promote outcomes on your terms, wisely or not.

exaltation.advice: You easily dominate relationships and support the advantages of emotional growth.

detriment.advice: Personal reform is your only recourse from a tendency to be disruptive in relationships.

lines.title: Being Diplomatic
lines.subtitle: Combining emotional clarity with objectivity.
lines.text: You promote concord through your neutrality, but find it hard to be really intimate yourself.

exaltation.advice: Your sensitivity to all facets of emotional upset leads you to promote harmony around you.

detriment.advice: Unless you are seen as being “right” you can be insensitive to the emotional needs of others.

lines.title: Being Contentious
lines.subtitle: A capacity to win disputes...and attract ones.
lines.text: You have the knack for resolving emotional upsets whether that directly serves others or not.

exaltation.advice: You have the emotional agility to reserve conflict by considering everything concerned.

detriment.advice: You terminate emotional strife, but often considering only your own needs for harmony.

lines.title: Being Disciplined
lines.subtitle: Effective coordination relies on the quality of shared commitments.
lines.text: Good leadership is achieved through establishing order by marking your intention clear.

exaltation.advice: You promote coordination and cooperation by launching a friendly yet disciplined course.

detriment.advice: Being easily distracted causes you to lose touch with real needs of any situation.

lines.title: Equanimity
lines.subtitle: Rewards come from implementing any natural advantage.
lines.text: Your leadership endures through aligning with, of taking advantage of, those you lead.

exaltation.advice: Being naturally inspirational you give reassurance to those seeking leadership.

detriment.advice: You have a potential, once elected, your self-interest before all other issues.

lines.title: Disordering
lines.subtitle: Disordering A reluctance to acknowledge or be drawn in to hierarchies of any sort.
lines.text: You find order in chaos though playing many, often separating and divergent roles.

exaltation.advice: You play many varying roles without ever necessarily finding a consistent one.

detriment.advice: You can make up reasons to avoid commitment by undermining the purpose in anything.

lines.title: Disengaging
lines.subtitle: Leadership in the highest integrity knows when and how to withdraw.
lines.text: You are either realistic or not about how your leadership can serve others best.

exaltation.advice: One of your strengths in leadership is in identifying situations where is it best to withdraw.

detriment.advice: Your unwillingness to ever stop advancing will eventually to you being abandoned.

lines.title: Directing
lines.subtitle: The confidence and ability to instruct others in the needs of the moment.
lines.text: As the overall commander, your clear communication in word and deed is essential.

exaltation.advice: You have the capacity to attract and sustain loyalty by honoring those being led.

detriment.advice: You become you become isolated and ineffective

lines.title: Meritocracy
lines.subtitle: Assigning responsibility and guidance to those who merit it.
lines.text: You remain flexible in using resources well, or become unwilling to lose personal control.

exaltation.advice: You communicate responsibility in ways that everyone feels included and appreciated.

detriment.advice: If you ever communicate responsibility as blame, you will upset the common intent.

lines.title: Being Authentic
lines.subtitle: Being candid will attract all those who wish to contribute.
lines.text: Your forthrightness attracts everyone who wishes to engage and co-create with their gifts.

exaltation.advice: You know that your efforts must be offered without concern for obvious rewards.

detriment.advice: You compromise your integrity by volunteering randomly and become exploited or spurned.

lines.title: Being the Friend
lines.subtitle: Friendliness ia an expression of the highest human ideal.
lines.text: You naturally empower others through your presence, encouragement and contributions.

exaltation.advice: Your expression of friendship is intrinsic to your nature.

detriment.advice: Your readiness to contribute has an underlying concern to be recognized and appreciated.

lines.title: Indulging
lines.subtitle: Contributing with a passionate indifference.
lines.text: You need to constantly check the basis of your commitments and the company you attract.

exaltation.advice: You express your apparent interest but often without necessarily ever committing yourself.

detriment.advice: You rely on techniques to impress others in ways to avoid getting involved with them.

lines.title: Being Statesmanlike
lines.subtitle: Empowering cooperation by welcoming all contributions.
lines.text: You give heartfelt encouragement to each individual to contribute in their own unique way.

exaltation.advice: You promote everyone to raise their standards through your contribution and example.

detriment.advice: Working “outside the box” your contributions may or not be appreciated by others.

lines.title: Benevolence
lines.subtitle: Attuning to how, when and what to co-create.
lines.text: Your timing and attitude assures how well any contribution is received.

exaltation.advice: Your abundant and kindly manner encourages everyone who is drawn to you.

detriment.advice: Your persistent contributing is ultimately appreciated whether you know this or not.

lines.title: Reevaluating
lines.subtitle: Constantly encouraging harmonious environments.
lines.text: You participate best when you appreciate the vital nature of all empowering contributions.

exaltation.advice: You comprehend the essence of creative contribution that bring benefits for everyone.

detriment.advice: You can become tangled in dramatic personal interactions that result in regrets.

lines.title: Recommencing
lines.subtitle: Continually reengaging with life from a sense of surety.
lines.text: You either embrace life’s essential details or get frustrated by treating them as problems.

exaltation.advice: Your intense focus gives you the power to find transformative keys to situations.

detriment.advice: You can push past problems, lose your focus and end up being distracted.

lines.title: Inclusion
lines.subtitle: The energy to include and be included.
lines.text: Your compulsion to collaborate will enhance or distract you from attaining your goals.

exaltation.advice: You collaborate successfully with others in recognizing fundamental details.

detriment.advice: You call on others to play a part in your life and sometimes regret their presence and input.

lines.title: Overlooking
lines.subtitle: Missing the one small but essential detail. Stay focused!
lines.text: Being distracted you can lose your focus for relevant details, or end up fixating over trivia.

exaltation.advice: Doggedly proceeding when you might be better off regrouping and reviewing.

detriment.advice: If you constantly obsess over a focus for details you will get poor returns for your efforts.

lines.title: Being Dependable
lines.subtitle: Staying president and focused despite distractions.
lines.text: Staying true to your intent, or passing over important details, determines your influence in life.

exaltation.advice: You need determination to act on the relevant details in all phases of a process.

detriment.advice: Habitually pushing past essential details, you will eventually succumb to outside pressures.

lines.title: Unquestioning
lines.subtitle: Accomplishment comes through trust and adherence to details.
lines.text: Accepting life’s bounty, or doubting your needs are met, affects your capacity to be fulfilled.

exaltation.advice: Your contagious power to focus aids in directing attention towards life’s essential details.

detriment.advice: A lack of strength to trust yourself aims you towards a growing dissatisfaction with life.

lines.title: Being Grateful
lines.subtitle: The joy and intelligence to celebrate at every opportunity.
lines.text: By degree all pressing issues are handled, giving you the space for celebration and relaxation.

exaltation.advice: Celebrating whenever you get the chance, and especially for any job well done!

detriment.advice: You enhance everything by celebrating, especially when you “turn lemons into lemonade.”

lines.title: Investigating
lines.subtitle: Finding your place in any situation and blending in.
lines.text: Steady progress in life requires your sensibility to everything you encounter along the way.

exaltation.advice: Your honorable behavior in every all situation fosters your growth.

detriment.advice: Feeling oversensitive or obligated to others can cause you to avoid life’s adventures.

lines.title: Finding Sanctuary
lines.subtitle: Contentment comes from not confronting impossible life dramas.
lines.text: Outer disputes can easily become inner ones, unless you sidestep others’ discords altogether.

exaltation.advice: Your active mind provides a quick fix or an easy escape from external problems.

detriment.advice: You tend to be actively engaged in avoiding anyone who might complicate your life.

lines.title: Surrendering
lines.subtitle: The principle of aligning with personally appropriate causes.
lines.text: Care is needed to be sure you are honoring your own reality and not someone else’s.

exaltation.advice: A persistently moderate yet steady approach to confronting trials brings you great rewards.

detriment.advice: You tend to seek attention and approval from others, disregarding your own genuine ideals.

lines.title: Exploring
lines.subtitle: Looking for great benefit and transformation in any interaction.
lines.text: Being ready when opportunity knocks and appreciating what an opportunity means to you.

exaltation.advice: You can hold out for the bright flash of opportunity that transforms everything.

detriment.advice: Mentally adjusting your behaviors you tailor any opening to a potential advantage.

lines.title: Re-Visioning
lines.subtitle: An enjoyment in confronting, often defying the commonplace.
lines.text: You enjoy challenging tradition and find there are many to do so, lovingly or not.

exaltation.advice: Your principled behavior directly challenges established tradition to question itself.

detriment.advice: Your tendency to challenge everyone and everything can attract personal reprisals.

lines.title: Bringing Alignment
lines.subtitle: A personal example that is impossible for others to ignore.
lines.text: Successful steps imply flourishing outcomes so long as you honor yourself and your journey.

exaltation.advice: Your considered step actions are often dramatically effective in their transformative outcome.

detriment.advice: If you take yourself too seriously you will miss much of the fun that life offers.

lines.title: Complimenting
lines.subtitle: Progressing by aligning with your immediate environment.
lines.text: Your ideas come and go, finding right company in which to share them is important.

exaltation.advice: You easily find those who will appreciate and help further your ideas.

detriment.advice: You can be overly worried sometimes that no one ever appreciates your ideas.

lines.title: Being Independent
lines.subtitle: Peacefulness is protected through your alertness.
lines.text: Tolerance, resolution and vision are required to maintain peace and foster your creative ideas.

exaltation.advice: Your expansive imagination is constantly checking all possibilities for a harmonious life.

detriment.advice: Being confronted because you indulge your provocative ideas just to escape boredom.

lines.title: Allowing for Change
lines.subtitle: Maintaining peacefulness requires relevant and fresh ideas.
lines.text: You need to discern a difference between valuable ideas and those that are simply idealistic.

exaltation.advice: Appreciating each moment, you acknowledge that times of peace come and go.

detriment.advice: You have a tendency to become lulled by an unrealistic attachment to harmony.

lines.title: Sharing Ideals
lines.subtitle: An ability to consider and convey ideas of merit to others.
lines.text: Some things are obvious, some things can be taught, and some things have to be transmitted.

exaltation.advice: You have the gilt of being able to teach and deliver concepts to almost anyone.

detriment.advice: You promote a sense of harmony that eventually appeals even to those who are disillusioned.

lines.title: The Ruler Who Serves
lines.subtitle: Giving perspective through expansive ideals.
lines.text: You overflow with beneficial ideas given either from a sense of service, or from your insecurity.

exaltation.advice: Your sensibility for good concepts and how to relate them, benefits all aspects of humanity.

detriment.advice: You tend to broadcast your ideas regardless of the effect they have on those listening.

lines.title: Being Flexible
lines.subtitle: Maintaining an inner balance as belief patterns change.
lines.text: Renewal follows adversity when you adjust your beliefs according to prevailing circumstances.

exaltation.advice: Embracing new beliefs allows you to maintain your sense of balance in changing times.

detriment.advice: You espouse ideas that will suit any situation, but sometimes at other people’s expanse.

lines.title: Standing Still
lines.subtitle: Appreciating how a harsh world aids your inner sense of freedom.
lines.text: withdrawing from the mainstream, you relate with those who appreciate your individual needs.

exaltation.advice: By avoiding many social interactions you find harmony in your own world.

detriment.advice: You tend to qualify unreasonable isolation regardless of the effect this has on others.

lines.title: Standpoint
lines.subtitle: Staying with your own truth aligns you with your own inner contentment.
lines.text: Your are either disciplined in your commitments, or you lapse and become agitated waiting.

exaltation.advice: Espousing natural principles you eliminate the possibility of being unbalanced by others.

detriment.advice: In restlessness you forget your natural social caution, and speak and act out of turn.

lines.title: Resurging
lines.subtitle: Going beyond any past missteps allows you to move on gracefully.
lines.text: Everyone makes mistakes, the greatest lesson in life is to absolve yourself and repeat them!

exaltation.advice: Attuning, though watchfulness, to the fragility we all suffer in relating with each other.

detriment.advice: A nagging sense of hopelessness that you will ever be able to have ‘normal’ relationships.

lines.title: Prophesying
lines.subtitle: The ability to know when change is coming and the need to be ready.
lines.text: Knowing the future and knowing how will tell of it may be two very different things!

exaltation.advice: Your inner attunement with the workings of Nature can foresee and express change.

detriment.advice: You might see the future, but have trouble relating it and knowing what to do practically.

lines.title: Establishing
lines.subtitle: Aligning with those aspects of your nature that are empowering.
lines.text: You know ‘who’, ‘wath’, and where are empowering, and either utilize this gift or disregard it.

exaltation.advice: You have the ability to overcome difficulties by envisioning far beyond them.

detriment.advice: You will be socially awkward as long as your emotional mix-ups remain unresolved.

lines.title: Transforming
lines.subtitle: Amazing changes can come from periods of standstill.
lines.text: Inventing your own rules you stand apart from the normal expression of social behaviors.

exaltation.advice: You have the means to express completely new empowering social conditions.

detriment.advice: Losing track of your vision and true purpose you easily get stuck in time-worn expression.

lines.title: Being Open
lines.subtitle: relating to and communing with everyone equally.
lines.text: Your friendliness with others aligns the world around you.

exaltation.advice: Your sensibility spreads a feeling of harmony and connectedness through everyone.

detriment.advice: You may have personal interests that disguise the intent of your expression of concern.

lines.title: Being Fair
lines.subtitle: Seeing two sides to every story and remaining unbiased.
lines.text: You have the possibility of humoring, clarifying, or even being divisive in all interactions.

exaltation.advice: Reflecting a moral high ground through your tolerance and consideration

detriment.advice: Inflexibility inclines you towards being intolerant to anyone else's viewpoint or values.

lines.title: Being Self-reliant
lines.subtitle: Mistrust and failure cycle through blindly taking other’s guidance.
lines.text: You need to find your own way after perhaps getting disillusioned with trying everyone else’s!

exaltation.advice: Your naturally suspicious nature is comforted by tangible evidence. “Show me the proof!”

detriment.advice: A sense of helplessness can emerge after finding no one to trust (except yourself).

lines.title: The Whisperer
lines.subtitle: The possibility of hearing life at a very deep level.
lines.text: Your sensitivity to hear at great inner depth is exhausted to plain noise.

exaltation.advice: Holding dearly to those who honor your nature, or actively seeking solitude in silence.

detriment.advice: Becoming exhausted in over-committing, you eventually crave times and places of solicitude.

lines.title: Living Symphony
lines.subtitle: Finding a purpose in, and for, everyone and everything.
lines.text: You esteem, exonerate, enjoy and exalt anyone as a vital player in human experience.

exaltation.advice: You have the gift to resolve all personal obstacles to attaining concord and purpose in life.

detriment.advice: You take on burdens for others when they might benefit by settling the burdens themselves.

lines.title: Expounding Universal Fellowship
lines.subtitle: Seeking the best in everyone and everything, everywhere.
lines.text: Apparently realisting or not, friendliness looks for the best outcomes in everyone’s life.

exaltation.advice: Decisively joining with other people you expect to be able to improve their lives.

detriment.advice: You believe that by sharing your interest with others you will improve any experience.

lines.title: Finding Satisfaction
lines.subtitle: Examining closely what it is that really motivates you.
lines.text: A dependence on anything outside you to make you happy will be found to be misplaced.

exaltation.advice: You have a principled approach to attaining and utilizing material resources.

detriment.advice: Attempting to control the flow of resources in life requires you to have great trust.

lines.title: Engaging Wholesomeness
lines.subtitle: Growing a capability to manage all your assent elegante.
lines.text: You maximize your resources though obtaining capable assistance, or by going it alone.

exaltation.advice: Your key to expanding wealth lies in receiving assistance from willing and capable helpers.

detriment.advice: If you only trust your own capability to carry everything, you will soon become overloaded.

lines.title: Sacrificing
lines.subtitle: Offering your talents and resources for the good of all.
lines.text: Giving for everyone’s benefit (yours included), or being charitable out of a sense of obligation.

exaltation.advice: Gifting others selflessly brings you the greatest possible personal satisfaction.

detriment.advice: The delusion that holding on to extra personal resources will bring you satisfaction.

lines.title: Being Secure
lines.subtitle: Personal security exists in having what you need.
lines.text: You ensure your empowerment by knowing what makes you secure and having it in your life.

exaltation.advice: Honing skills to ensure a personal sensation of security through any changes life brings.

detriment.advice: Exercising caution allows you to develop the personal skills you need to thrive in life.

lines.title: Being Sincere
lines.subtitle: Appropriate interactions with others concerning material matters.
lines.text: Your knack for handling the material word needs skills when you relate with the people in it!

exaltation.advice: Your dignified ways ensures everyone’s appreciation in all material interactions.

detriment.advice: Being overly friendly in material matters will inevitably lead you into misunderstandings.

lines.title: Being Worthy
lines.subtitle: Existence gives resources and blessing to whomever it chooset!
lines.text: A spiritual and/or material approach to the responsibilities associated with wealth.

exaltation.advice: Your easy attunement to wealth gives you the humility to be generous and grateful.

detriment.advice: A practical approach allows you to find a balance between material and spiritual realms.

lines.title: Having Humility
lines.subtitle: Having the self-discipline to transcend all manner of life issues.
lines.text: You either maintain a sensibility to your nature and needs, or ani security that is immodest.

exaltation.advice: Honoring the harmony in any relationship allows you to facilitate any enterprise.

detriment.advice: Rushing to enact and pronounce your personal achievements can alienate others.

lines.title: Being Persistent
lines.subtitle: Finding reassurance by maintaining your sincerity and integrity.
lines.text: Your moderation as well as your extreme conduct, has a profound effect on others.

exaltation.advice: You have the strength to accept your own particular ways as natural in the flow of life.

detriment.advice: Contriving outcomes by comparing your extreme ways to other people’s moderate ones.

lines.title: Being Modest
lines.subtitle: An unwavering commitment to finish what you start.
lines.text: Accomplishing deeds without asserting your supremacy affects the of your whole life.

exaltation.advice: Completing all tasks you remain unassuming in achievement.

detriment.advice: The possibility you communicate a personal superiority of yourself over other people and their ways.

lines.title: Centering
lines.subtitle: Restraining any extremes in your life that do not reflect love.
lines.text: Being loving and true to the flow of life requires you to constantly check your inner guidance.

exaltation.advice: The humility to achieve your best in a way that is in accord with your highest ideals.

detriment.advice: A dogmatic approach to going your own way that awkwardly strives for goals.

lines.title: Fellowship
lines.subtitle: Attuning to the needs of all those in extreme position.
lines.text: You guide those with less experience through tough situations, by virtue, or by being brash.

exaltation.advice: Your leadership quality can handle the turbulent flow of life and also maintain humility.

detriment.advice: Any push to impose on those less competent that yourself will end up alienating them.

lines.title: Commentary
lines.subtitle: Setting an example by taking responsibility for your own circumstances in life.
lines.text: By accepting and appreciating who you are, you find an exemplary course through life.

exaltation.advice: You can take charge and steer any situation at any time, and do so with humility.

detriment.advice: Seeking harmony in all interactions you can blame others when things appear to go wrong!

lines.title: Paying Attention
lines.subtitle: Enthusiasm can be aligned to the real needs of the moment or not.
lines.text: Having a clear grasp of what is confronting you requires presence, interest and detachment.

exaltation.advice: You can easily get involved in situations without always considering what’s really going on.

detriment.advice: You tend to make declarations on behalf of other people that cannot easily be substantiated.

lines.title: Being Watchful
lines.subtitle: You consider life objectively and comment accordingly.
lines.text: You have the ability to see through to the merits of any scheme both neutrally and critically.

exaltation.advice: You have natural skill to judge any situation impartially, regardless of what others say.

detriment.advice: You express a pointed analysis that might easily dampen other people’s excitement.

lines.title: Re-forming
lines.subtitle: Delight comes in winning your own accomplishment.
lines.text: There is a fine line between needing encouragement from outside and going it alone.

exaltation.advice: Attuning to your own enthusiasm you gauge how to propel your life through any situation.

detriment.advice: The need to have others aim, confirm and sometimes bankroll your or talents.

lines.title: Guiding
lines.subtitle: Confidence in dealing with life’s problems draws others to your side.
lines.text: It’s easy for you to give support and recognition to others, or you might ignore their offerings.

exaltation.advice: Your enthusiasm for combining efforts aimed at lofty goals will gather widespread support.

detriment.advice: In pushing to get ahead you can fail to acknowledge any assistance you get, or need for it.

lines.title: Resisting
lines.subtitle: An unwillingness to encourage yourself or others to move on in life.
lines.text: You recognize potentials, but tend to avoid endorsing them if you consider them unattainable.

exaltation.advice: You are rarely overtly enthusiastic about anything or anyone, before seeing real results.

detriment.advice: Moodiness will result in your being reluctant to encourage advancing any schemes.

lines.title: Re-assessing
lines.subtitle: Objective evaluation of realistic goals.
lines.text: You either see things as they really are, or get flustered by others’ expectations and lose clarity.

exaltation.advice: By envisioning everyone’s views, you adjust your goals accordingly, practically or not.

detriment.advice: Expanding any concept regardless of outcomes, you’ll eventually become disenchanted.

lines.title: Being Open-minted
lines.subtitle: Recognizing the potential dualities in all things.
lines.text: You appreciate many different views of life, none of which by themselves, are right or wrong.

exaltation.advice: You promote many different opinions while still holding true to your internal principles.

detriment.advice: Losing sight of your principles when your sense of harmony is disturbed by others' opinions.

lines.title: Assessing
lines.subtitle: Preferring company that moves you to a higher appreciation of life.
lines.text: You find meaning for yourself by relating with others, whether your relationship last or not.

exaltation.advice: You develop your qualitative opinions through your attention to all of life’s interactions.

detriment.advice: A moodiness can cause you to value your opinions over your friendship.

lines.title: Selecting
lines.subtitle: Appreciating the best influences for inner growth.
lines.text: You either foster viewpoints that bring maturity, or endorse ones without lasting significance.

exaltation.advice: You have an enduring and transformative effect when aligned with honorable company.

detriment.advice: Your tendency to seek any means to obtain results will cause you to miss essential issues.

lines.title: Being Unselfish
lines.subtitle: Open to finding the best measures to further everyone.
lines.text: Opinions can conceal ulterior motives giving you the opportunity to test your inner principles.

exaltation.advice: You have a transformative effect on others when your motives and principles are aligner.

detriment.advice: You express opinions that attract everyone even those people you would rather avoid.

lines.title: Interconnecting
lines.subtitle: The recognition that ‘We are One.’
lines.text: You attain your highest aims by your virtue, or by attempting to disregard cosmic coincidence.

exaltation.advice: Your inventiveness is aligner with spiritual and/or worldly resolutions.

detriment.advice: Your push for personal recognition can rule out receiving assistance from any other source.

lines.title: Being The Bodhisattva
lines.subtitle: Attuning to the higher levels of human consciousness.
lines.text: you foster and express wisdom in ways to honor and align others in their own lives.

exaltation.advice: ”The finger pointing at the moon.” You can access the sincerity and simplicity of life.

detriment.advice: By attaining to a human comprehension of Existence you are a teacher.

lines.title: Being Paternalistic
lines.subtitle: The difficulties involved in updating male traditions.
lines.text: Patriarchal traditions are rooted in his-tory and examine them to find present relevance.

exaltation.advice: You have the endurance to gradually bring practical modification to ancient judgments.

detriment.advice: By expounding life from traditional views will remain stuck in someone else’s.

lines.title: Honoring the Goddess
lines.subtitle: Instilled fears involving the power of the feminine.
lines.text: Any tendency to suppress the feminine side of your nature requires great inner watchfulness.

exaltation.advice: You have potential to transform your inherited fears through diligence and alertness.

detriment.advice: Sensitive to those who instilled your fears you are reluctant to hurt their feelings.

lines.title: Being Impetuous
lines.subtitle: Driven to break with the past and get to the future, now!
lines.text: Examining what is no longer needed in your life gives you the possibility to be free from it!

exaltation.advice: Highly critical of your old conditioning you find imaginative ways to address it.

detriment.advice: Any attempts to bypass or discount your conditioning eventually brings you remorse.

lines.title: Allowing things be to
lines.subtitle: Attempting to cure symptoms and not causes.
lines.text: Going to the heart of problematic issues you see if you actually attract them. A call to meditate.

exaltation.advice: Fixating on curing your apparent inabilities, or finding freedom in your own clarity.

detriment.advice: Mental anxiety and procrastination are brought on when you indulge others’ criticism.

lines.title: Self-correcting
lines.subtitle: An honest to resolve conditioning thought being alert.
lines.text: Your watchfulness and presence in all situations can clarify any conditioning and bring relief.

exaltation.advice: Any improvements are sustained through relationships that relax your fears of worthiness.

detriment.advice: Relating to others in ways that do not resolve conditioning, you cause further imbalance.

lines.title: Being the Buddha
lines.subtitle: Going beyond all conditioning.
lines.text: You dedicate yourself to universal concerns and spiritual development for all beings.

exaltation.advice: You have the ability and drive to expound universal truths wherever you are.

detriment.advice: You exude the reassurance to reveal that there are no insurmountable problems in life.

lines.title: Finding Mutuality
lines.subtitle: Reaching out to find supportive company.
lines.text: Your emotional detachment and inner equilibrium are tested through interaction with others.

exaltation.advice: You have the strength to hold to your principles when confronted by outside influences.

detriment.advice: A tendency when considering others’ needs to get distracted from your own.

lines.title: Cooperating
lines.subtitle: A right approach wins allies.
lines.text: You have a natural gift to assist others by summoning support from many sources.

exaltation.advice: You overcome all difficulties by trusting in your uncontrived high ideals.

detriment.advice: ”Being there” for others so that you feed included and not necessarily always to assist them.

lines.title: Getting Involved
lines.subtitle: Great care is needed to distinguish real needs and wants.
lines.text: Relationships yield poor attitudes if you are motivated by neediness instead of inner clarity.

exaltation.advice: You maintain a natural inner harmony in your approval of, and by others.

detriment.advice: Your moodiness can become a neediness that dominates all your interactions with others.

lines.title: Maturing
lines.subtitle: Composed behavior in group interaction furthers teamwork.
lines.text: You are mostly at ease being among others and help to combine everyone’s contributions.

exaltation.advice: You drive others to excel through your efforts, exemple and encouragement.

detriment.advice: Within a group you tend to be promoting harmony rather than result.

lines.title: Delegating
lines.subtitle: Offering up personal initiatives to capable helpers.
lines.text: You support everyone by delegating to capable assistants while retaining overall responsibility.

exaltation.advice: Your inner confidence and strength of purpose enjoys seeing your associates get ahead.

detriment.advice: When you delegate authority without regard to someone’s capabilities, chaos ensues.

lines.title: The Sage
lines.subtitle: Teaching about inner growth from your own depth of experience.
lines.text: You can provide immense support to others through imparting compassionate wisdom.

exaltation.advice: Your magnanimous nature must sometimes be enticed from you to engage with others.

detriment.advice: You prefer to be approached respectfully, so that you can more easily impart your wisdom.

lines.title: Simplicity
lines.subtitle: ..... is the key to awareness!
lines.text: Each small event is a part of a larger scheme of events. Your own viewing of life is essential.

exaltation.advice: You find beauty and harmony in apparent simplicity. For example: A panoramic view.

detriment.advice: A moody oversimplification of life can cause you to shirk personal responsibility.

lines.title: Viewpoint
lines.subtitle: Weighing personal perspectives with reality of the World.
lines.text: If your unaffected observations are not appreciated, you can easily become discouraged.

exaltation.advice: Broadening your perspectives through finding harmony in every moment.

detriment.advice: If you take everything seriously you’ll form narrow and potentially moody viewpoints.

lines.title: Being Objective
lines.subtitle: Developing an ability to watch thoughts and action impassively.
lines.text: Establishing guidelines by dispassionately watching the effect you have on your world.

exaltation.advice: Honoring your ‘witnessing consciousness’ you’ll find assists you to glide through your life.

detriment.advice: Your self-consciousness can be a stumbling block when you are relating in the word.

lines.title: Observing
lines.subtitle: Promoting the best influences in your world.
lines.text: Impacting situations by recognizing and enabling the best attributes in yourself and others.

exaltation.advice: You expound knowledge in varied ways according to the requirements of the moment.

detriment.advice: You communicate through remarks that may not have any instant practical value.

lines.title: Meditating
lines.subtitle: Watching your deepest thoughts and feelings dispassionately.
lines.text: Open to hearing the world’s comments on your life, you engage from a place of inner clarity.

exaltation.advice: You have a disciplined approach towards promoting sound standards in the world.

detriment.advice: Becoming unhappy with your present reality you tend to chase drama and diversion.

lines.title: Reflecting
lines.subtitle: Considering those agendas that benefit everyone.
lines.text: Your detached amasses realistic knowledge that is available for everyone to utilize.

exaltation.advice: You have the ability to expound your individual clarity for the greater good.

detriment.advice: Your ability to communicate promotes knowledge of all kinds whether it's useful or not.

lines.title: Being Responsible
lines.subtitle: Correcting your small mistakes allows for easy growth in life.
lines.text: Your mistakes are natural but need correcting responsibly to avoid having problems later.

exaltation.advice: You derive respect without needing to be tough on yourself or others.

detriment.advice: Indulging a lack of will power and “giving up” continually diminishes your conviction.

lines.title: Courage
lines.subtitle: Giving and receiving correction for any necessary reforms.
lines.text: Your willingness to improve life standards often requires strong, yet virtuous remedies.

exaltation.advice: Deliberately applying correction for yourself and others when handling irresponsible acts.

detriment.advice: Any reluctance to achieve reforms certainly results in losing your sense of responsibility.

lines.title: Hesitating
lines.subtitle: Being potentiality overwhelmed by apparent circumstances.
lines.text: Getting caught up in other people’s ego issues always affects your level of commitment in life.

exaltation.advice: You will suffer at the hands of those “in power,” unless you follow your own material path.

detriment.advice: You tend to needlessly go-it alone at the expense of your own well-being.

lines.title: ”Biting the bullet”
lines.subtitle: Dealing with all situations in life using great self-control.
lines.text: You easily establish your authority by weighing up any environment and the people in it.

exaltation.advice: You expand into material success through strategic moves and not by conditioned reflex.

detriment.advice: Continually establishing your separateness easily distracts you from your real needs.

lines.title: Being Galant
lines.subtitle: Considering who merits efforts to bring the best reforms.
lines.text: Using your willpower activery or by delegating you keep control and direct material matters.

exaltation.advice: You easily apply your willful authority for the ultimate benefit of everyone.

detriment.advice: insisting on your way, regardless of consequences, you will eventually become alienated.

lines.title: Amending
lines.subtitle: A delicate touch can bring needed adjustments to any situation.
lines.text: Being available to implement necessary controls or losing focus and promoting confusion.

exaltation.advice: Displaying your willpower in any situation you automatically bring about changes.

detriment.advice: promoting harmony at any cost rather than facing facts, you can expect disorder in your life.

lines.title: Being Gracious
lines.subtitle: Assuming humility and appreciation for all aspects.
lines.text: Relying on your own essential worth and being open to embrace any roles offered by life.

exaltation.advice: The emotional awareness to feel empowered and guided from within your core.

detriment.advice: Assuming roles which are not actually required or relevant, inevitably brings you problems.

lines.title: Charming
lines.subtitle: The natural ability to embellish and adorn.
lines.text: Beauty and style are attributes you use to promote enchantment, fascination and distraction.

exaltation.advice: Your natural emotional style attracts others, and moves and uplifts their lives.

detriment.advice: If you place style before emotion awareness in your life you will eventually promote fallout.

lines.title: Enchanting
lines.subtitle: Grace in perfection. A charmed life.Good fortune.
lines.text: You embody Grace as all things wondrous, aligning yourself with simple Universal truths.

exaltation.advice: You align emotional energy and a perception that empowers your inner radiance.

detriment.advice: Your pure physicality embodies grace in all your movements and activities.

lines.title: Impressing
lines.subtitle: Empowering all interactions by aligning to their requirements.
lines.text: Your inner radiance and external brilliance transforms the quality of all interactions.

exaltation.advice: You have a very particular way to interact that rejects many formalities adopted by others.

detriment.advice: You may find yourself manipulating circumstances in an attempt to force interaction.

lines.title: Inner Beauty
lines.subtitle: Remembering the importance of your own true nature.
lines.text: Being true to yourself even as your grace and inner light is perceived in many ways by others.

exaltation.advice: You have the individual's strength to empower emotional clarity in any social interaction.

detriment.advice: The possibility of being misunderstood for your distinctive stance in social situations.

lines.title: Being Sophisticated
lines.subtitle: Simple elegance is one of your highest attributes.
lines.text: Your inner brightness exudes grace through calm sincerity and objectivity in any situation.

exaltation.advice: Your serene presence easily allows you to take charge in emotionally volatile situations.

detriment.advice: Your inner brilliance will always be perceived as unique and provocative.

lines.title: Validating
lines.subtitle: Aiming your attention on what really needs attention.
lines.text: You strive to find the inner conviction to continue relating to life’s changing circumstances.

exaltation.advice: You express personal insights that may or may not represent the truth of the moment.

detriment.advice: By expressing your personal views you will often provoke disruptive reactions in others.

lines.title: Tolerating
lines.subtitle: Naturally relating to circumstances from a personal resolve.
lines.text: Being self-righteous or detached does not necessarily help you express yourself clearly.

exaltation.advice: The gift of the gab, to talk your way into and through all manner of life’s obstacles.

detriment.advice: Being argumentative can become a way of life but ultimately will not serve you.

lines.title: Expressing Uniqueness
lines.subtitle: Trusting in yourself while being committed to others.
lines.text: Staying true to your own ways but also noticing how what other people do and say affects you.

exaltation.advice: Expressing your individuality while diligently holding to your personal truth.

detriment.advice: You speak in a way that your expression can attract concern, suspicion and retribution.

lines.title: Diversifying
lines.subtitle: Individual strength overcomes all tribulations.
lines.text: Your individual, impulsive expression often confound generally accepted ways of life.

exaltation.advice: The effect of the things you say requires you to question what it is you hear yourself say.

detriment.advice: Expressing your insights freely inevitably results in your isolation from the mainstream.

lines.title: Acquiescing
lines.subtitle: The mutual benefit in offering different, even contrary choices.
lines.text: You, the individual, have the means to interact with others for personal or mutual advantage.

exaltation.advice: You have the gift of being able to relate your personal insights for everyone’s gain.

detriment.advice: You can be driven by a need to cooperate for personal ease rather than mutual benefits.

lines.title: Synthesizing
lines.subtitle: Creating new forms by combining many different possibilities.
lines.text: Remaining neutral while under pressure from the status quo allows you to propose new vision.

exaltation.advice: Your individual way empowers the possibility of directing diverse opinions towards a unity.

detriment.advice: Your expansive nature tends to prefer and encourage diversity to unity

lines.title: Being Principled
lines.subtitle: A constant need to review what is personally meaningful.
lines.text: Your mental processes can excuse your own truth for one rationale or another.

exaltation.advice: You have the clear intent to proceed in life while aligning firmly with your principles.

detriment.advice: You reassess obscure thoughts while justifying inaction and lack of conviction.

lines.title: Renewing
lines.subtitle: Attracting a loving environment while under duress.
lines.text: All adversity brings growth when you remember who and what truly aids and inspires you.

exaltation.advice: You are constantly re-attuning to empowering, evolving concepts that bring benefits.

detriment.advice: You easily isolate yourself from common concerns as though you are all alone.

lines.title: Being Indecisive
lines.subtitle: Trying to think your way through life.
lines.text: A reliance on old, rotating mental concepts can bring you successes but no lasting satisfaction.

exaltation.advice: By softening your mental attitudes you can to be open to other means of being guided.

detriment.advice: You vacillate between many possibilities without conclusion. The thinka-/worka-holic.

lines.title: Being Attentive
lines.subtitle: Cultivating mental clarity while in the company of others.
lines.text: You need to look for the balance between an easy mental pattern and a personally correct one.

exaltation.advice: Your disciplined review includes all options and continuously realigns them with personal truth.

detriment.advice: A dreamy nature promotes fantasy realms rather than allowing you to face your reality.

lines.title: Returning
lines.subtitle: The resolution to renounce false trails and resume invention.
lines.text: Through clarity and determination you make a clean break with the past, and start afresh.

exaltation.advice: Empowering new inspiration is possible when you terminate stale ones.

detriment.advice: A rigid rationalization of old concepts blocks any chance for you to be refreshed.

lines.title: Relenting
lines.subtitle: Dropping old concepts in the face of life’s new offerings.
lines.text: Past missteps need not limit the range of new choices if you revisit your own clear Authority.

exaltation.advice: Your relaxed and rational thought process recognizes and welcomes all of life’s gifts.

detriment.advice: Obstinacy can cause irrational worries that hinder personal development.

lines.title: loving
lines.subtitle: Living without ulterior motives.
lines.text: your heartfelt spontaneity is potentially prone to being disturbed by outside influences.

exaltation.advice: A deep attunement and interplay with the mysterious courses your life takes.

detriment.advice: An inner insecurity inclines you to express yourself out of a need to compare.

lines.title: Being Present
lines.subtitle: All expectations divert appreciation from the Now.
lines.text: You either live freely for the moment or try anticipating results and remain unfulfilled.

exaltation.advice: You have an aptitude to stay present to each moment, living innocently and in freedom.

detriment.advice: Pushing to realize dreams you lose your delight in life when outcomes are disappointing.

lines.title: Adjusting
lines.subtitle: Accepting unexpected events with equanimity.
lines.text: When things appear to go wrong you either accept the results or feed forsaken and hopeless.

exaltation.advice: The power to remain unruffled in times of loss by persevering in your innocent love of life.

detriment.advice: you have a potential for personal devastation in your life when shocked by, or handed loss.

lines.title: Being Blameless
lines.subtitle: True innocence cannot be tainted.
lines.text: When aligning with inner vision, your innocent stance is unperturbed by any disturbances.

exaltation.advice: The Spiritual Warrior who strides through life unscathed by all trials and disasters.

detriment.advice: Maintaining the highest ideals even when no one else cares.

lines.title: Healthiness
lines.subtitle: There is no worldly cure for Spiritual sickness.
lines.text: By guarding your health through right association and attitudes you can greatly assist others.

exaltation.advice: The healer who calls on the power of Spiritual to heal and be healed.

detriment.advice: Misjudging your Spirit nature can induce you to constantly overextend yourself.

lines.title: Misunderstanding
lines.subtitle: Adhering to Knowledge will undermine true innocence.
lines.text: Ultimately, knowledge rarely serves you, especially when you try second-guessing Existence.

exaltation.advice: you remain steadfast in your pursuit of purity even if you have to reinvent yourself.

detriment.advice: brilliantly different though you may be, Knowledge alone seldom brings you contentment.

lines.title: Pausing
lines.subtitle: Waiting patiently for the right time to act.
lines.text: Sometimes you cannot move any further in life without attracting and collecting problems.

exaltation.advice: You use your livery imagination to resolve dilemmas and thus avoid reckless action.

detriment.advice: Insisting on being separate you force yourself into many activities that cause disruptions.

lines.title: Being Self-restrained
lines.subtitle: Patience is a virtue that serves in the long term.
lines.text: When held up by forces beyond your control you are best advised to exercise patience.

exaltation.advice: You exercise your power by progressively accumulating experience and resources.

detriment.advice: Forcing the pace and overriding past experiences, your path through life can be costly.

lines.title: Being Prepared
lines.subtitle: Being clear in your motivations and how to exercise them well.
lines.text: You succeed with or without the help of others when you overcome your fears and doubts.

exaltation.advice: Your strength of will to align with your goals allows you to gather support to attain them.

detriment.advice: You succumb to obstacles and challenges if you ignore what people around you really want.

lines.title: Preventing
lines.subtitle: Keeping away from irrelevant and dishonorable forms of interaction.
lines.text: You uphold what you deem is honorably right or implement some questionable standards.

exaltation.advice: The strength of your willpower transforms even the most rigid and obdurate situations.

detriment.advice: You implement techniques that support bending ‘the rules’ to get your own way.

lines.title: Harnessing
lines.subtitle: Utilizing your accumulated energies wisely.
lines.text: Your willful energy requires careful managing or will continuously bring you confrontation.

exaltation.advice: Directing your accumulated energy carefully gives you the potential to attract rewards.

detriment.advice: You prefer to maintain a comfortable stance rather than relate to real circumstances.

lines.title: Being Poised
lines.subtitle: Creative energy is released from a place of inner equilibrium

lines.title: Nurturing Yourself
lines.subtitle: Taking care of Number One!
lines.text: You take charge of your own well-being, or tend to give all your attention to other people’s.

exaltation.advice: Your power to care means you easily take responsibility for all your own needs as a priority.

detriment.advice: Always seeing others’ care as more important than your own is an easy way to be depleted

lines.title: Being Accountable
lines.subtitle: Taking good care of yourself and your needs is natural.
lines.text: You either nourish your needs or generate a reliance on others to provide resources for you.

exaltation.advice: A great reservoir of caring and resources is available between all lives in many ways.

detriment.advice: you tend to make demands that other people fulfill many of your requirements in life.

lines.title: Being Resourceful
lines.subtitle: Recognizing who and what is nourishing in any situation.
lines.text: Your constant search for nourishment often looks for it needlessly, and in unsuitable places.

exaltation.advice: You undergo transformation through indulging personal needs on many levels.

detriment.advice: You may have a drive to indulge yourself in ways that rarely bring nourishment.

lines.title: Being Beauteous
lines.subtitle: Supporting everyone through giving and receiving.
lines.text: You sometimes need an objective view of others’ lives to find how to disburse your resources.

exaltation.advice: Your generous disposition to nourish others comes from your own inner well-being.

detriment.advice: your drive to provide for everyone can easily deplete yours’ and others’ resources.

lines.title: Disbursing
lines.subtitle: Handling resources for the greatest benefits.
lines.text: You easily distribute nourishment for everyone’s benefit, or get overwhelmed by demands.

exaltation.advice: You need to retain your balance in the face of seemingly endless demands for caring.

lines.title: Providing Guardianship
lines.subtitle: Qualifying the use of all nourishing resources.
lines.text: Successful steps imply flourishing outcomes so long as you honor yourself and your journey.

exaltation.advice: Your holistic approach provides caring through all aspects of any healing process.

detriment.advice: Transformation that comes through applying stringent codes of caring.

lines.title: Offering
lines.subtitle: Being intuitively open to deal with challenges.
lines.text: Attuning to the needs of the moment you attend to either useful or to factors.

exaltation.advice: You have a drive to use anything that might assist in handling life’s challenges.

detriment.advice: you engage your need for harmony rather than encountering the needs of a moment directly.

lines.title: A Friend in Need
lines.subtitle: Finding & offering assistance in tough times in unusual places.
lines.text: You fulfill all needs by aligning yourself with any source that is willing to cooperate with you.

exaltation.advice: You intuit where to find the best assistance whether you make ‘obvious’ choices or not.

detriment.advice: Your expensive nature may forego personal principles when under pressure.

lines.title: Being Rash
lines.subtitle: Relying on an unknowable future.
lines.text: Acting brashly or fearfully can cause you to lose touch with your present reality.

exaltation.advice: You have the self discipline to listen to your intuition for guidance, especially in times of struggle.

detriment.advice: Your promotional nature tends to favor external realities over personal intuitive guidance.

lines.title: Being Strong
lines.subtitle: Finding extra inner resources to learn and grow.
lines.text: Either you combine your intuitive gifts with your inner strength, or you collapse under duress.

exaltation.advice: Your intuitive depth embraces difficulties and touches others’ lives by personal example.

detriment.advice: Confusion is almost guaranteed by attempting to think your way through difficulties.

lines.title: Trusting
lines.subtitle: Relating clearly with your present environment.
lines.text: You can intuitively honor your reality, or attempt to restructure it and cause it to collapse.

exaltation.advice: By intuiting how to bypass problems you bring transportation to everyone involved.

detriment.advice: By constantly seeking personal benefits in your life, you appear to be unreliable.

lines.title: Grandeur
lines.subtitle: A tendency to “get in over your head.”
lines.text: Holding high ideas makes you reluctant to put up with personally degrading circumstances.

exaltation.advice: The deeply, essential transformative drive to “win” in the game of life, regardless.

lines.title: Being Cautious
lines.subtitle: Wondering if you can succeed will cause you to wobble.
lines.text: Responding to situations, according to only what is GENUINELY needed, or else inviting trouble.

exaltation.advice: Driving yourself to act only according to the requirements of any specific situation.

detriment.advice: Your hesitation to commit yourself only because of past problems will cause more trouble.

lines.title: Advancing Slowly
lines.subtitle: A contentment with gradual achievements.
lines.text: Your endeavors are sustained by proceeding directly and gradually, or undone by rushing.

exaltation.advice: The nature of saying “Yes!” with the power to persist regardless of circumstances.

detriment.advice: Blinding yourself to real commitments allow you to maintain a sense of harmony.

lines.title: Holding Out
lines.subtitle: Allowing decisiveness for change to come in its own natural way.
lines.text: Finding that caution gives perspective over life’s urgencies, you still feed an impulse to proceed.

exaltation.advice: Realizing how important your clarity is to be able to commit decisively in your life.

detriment.advice: An inability to make commitments due to your expanded, even unrealistic sense of caution.

lines.title: Committing
lines.subtitle: Being clear about your challenges brings relief quickly.
lines.text: Embracing opportunities to move into any openings life offers, you experience rapid changes.

exaltation.advice: You have the discipline to commit yourself totally to the simplest and most direct processes.

detriment.advice: To avoid difficulties by down-playing their relevance, you can miss opportunities in your life.

lines.title: Being Restrained
lines.subtitle: Moving into and through a cycle with clarity.
lines.text: Your clear commitments is enough to avoid excesses, otherwise you get exhausted by indulging.

exaltation.advice: The clear responsiveness to say “Yes!” with a persistence that somehow brings completion.

detriment.advice: A tendency to say “Yes” blindly and without the inner clarity to evaluate what is involved.

lines.title: Entangling
lines.subtitle: Clearing your path in and behind.
lines.text: You have an ability to get involved in anything, anytime, or you can choose to wait for clarity!

exaltation.advice: The power to persevere that makes no sense often allows you to realize your goals.

detriment.advice: You over-commit despite the inevitable problems that arise from promises unkept.

lines.title: Clarifying
lines.subtitle: Finding inner balance whenever feelings stir.
lines.text: As your feelings arise there is a moment to relate to them clearly or be overwhelmed by them.

exaltation.advice: Inner sureness and stability allows you to ride all feelings, no matter what the situation.

detriment.advice: You recognize your changing feelings but have trouble disidentifying with them.

lines.title: Finding The Golden Mean
lines.subtitle: Moderating between extremes of feelings.
lines.text: Clarity comes by finding the “golden thread” between the highs and lows of an emotional wave.

exaltation.advice: The strength to be true to your feelings and find considerate, natural ways to express them.

detriment.advice: Expressing feelings and desires regardless of the effects they have on yourself and others.

lines.title: Keeping Your Cool
lines.subtitle: Going beyond desires by going through them.
lines.text: ”All things must pass,” and you honor the acceptance or regret when acknowledging this.

exaltation.advice: A persistently moderate yet steady approach to confronting trials brings you great rewards.

detriment.advice: Recognizing that life predictably bring you great waves of both exhilaration and despair.

lines.title: Pacing
lines.subtitle: Enduring potential meltdowns and moving on.
lines.text: Finalizing certain passages of life conclusivery, alerts you to refresh, rebuild and realing.

exaltation.advice: The deep intensity of feelings that impels you through experiences as transformations.

detriment.advice: You may express runaway feelings that bring exhaustion without satisfaction.

lines.title: Heartsease
lines.subtitle: Acknowledging that embracing adversity enriches your life.
lines.text: Balancing between feelings that bring you growth and surrendering to the will of Existence.

exaltation.advice: The openness to explore your true feelings in depth before judging or acting on them.

detriment.advice: Transformation comes through releasing feeling that never bring you fulfillment.

lines.title: Being Purified
lines.subtitle: Self acceptance and the clarity to release emotional expectations.
lines.text: You either embrace feelings and release, or succumb to their inherent problems.

exaltation.advice: Driven to eliminate negative feelings you encourage others to do the same.

detriment.advice: Moodiness makes it difficult to distinguish between your healthy and unhealthy feelings.

lines.title: Opening
lines.subtitle: Finding the sincerity to allow yourself to be influential.
lines.text: You either offer your ideals in simple ways or through contrived means.

exaltation.advice: You express leadership through clear alignment with your inherent aims.

detriment.advice: Attempting to establish influential roles you might align with status rather than ideals.

lines.title: Acting Independently
lines.subtitle: Attuning to the correct time to act.
lines.text: Your independence is influential when you move to your own perception of timing.

exaltation.advice: Your influence grows because of your trust in your own inner guidance.

detriment.advice: Confusion stems from a mental push to be influential that cannot wait for real clarity.

lines.title: Distinguishing
lines.subtitle: Observing any impulse to influence others.
lines.text: Your need to be clear in yourself to find mutual influence and benefit in all dealings with others.

exaltation.advice: Your capacity to lead is enhanced by inner clarity and associations with worthy influences.

detriment.advice: A yearning to lead often exposes you to the influences of unhelpful company.

lines.title: Convincing
lines.subtitle: All influence is realized according to its openness and purity of intent.
lines.text: A sincere and clear heart allows you to influence others from your inner certainty.

exaltation.advice: You are highly regarded for your heartfelt capacity to take charge in all situations.

detriment.advice: You can persuade others in ways that are not necessarily aligned with their actual needs.

lines.title: Being Farsighted
lines.subtitle: Holding the interaction to assert influence for bright outcomes.
lines.text: Clear outcomes can be affirmed through your inner certainty or as a matter of fixed discipline.

exaltation.advice: Power comes through recognizing your own stance in influencing and being influenced.

detriment.advice: Any moodiness limits your influence, making it difficult at times to connect with the world.

lines.title: Being Diligent
lines.subtitle: Relating your influence in the world from your own depth.
lines.text: Intellectual comments rarely have much effect, whether you seek to influence others or not.

exaltation.advice: Being clear in your own life and influencing others by living according to your vision.

detriment.advice: A tendency to guide others dogmatically rather than trusting your own innate intelligence.

lines.title: Being Consistent
lines.subtitle: Lasting results require a constancy in your attitude.
lines.text: Adapting your life style to change is a process requiring intent and attention to each moment.

exaltation.advice: The bright nature to apply your attention to all aspects of a transforming process.

detriment.advice: Achieving results you override the instincts that assist you to resolve difficulties.

lines.title: Avoiding extremes
lines.subtitle: Holding a steady course.
lines.text: You are either alert during times of change, or become confused by interacting with others.

exaltation.advice: Your natural approach to dealing with changes brings benefits for everyone concerned.

detriment.advice: Your sensitivity to complaints causes you to pursue unnecessary and untitled changes.

lines.title: Withstanding
lines.subtitle: Using your inner guidance when distracted by change.
lines.text: Your steady or casual approach to taking on changes determines your ability to adapt to them.

exaltation.advice: All times of transformation require you remain clear to your inner, enduring intention.

detriment.advice: Making problems out to be bigger than they are limits your alertness in times of change.

lines.title: Being Realisting
lines.subtitle: Re-evaluating your needs clearly.
lines.text: Being true to your overall goals gives you added confidence when challenged by changes.

exaltation.advice: Your inner optimism endorses your own principles and adaptability in times of change.

detriment.advice: An inner practicality adapts your principles to the needs of any challenging situations.

lines.title: Complying
lines.subtitle: Staying aligned with changes.
lines.text: You need to interact creativery in all of life’s changing and challenging situations.

exaltation.advice: Your shifting sense of the nature of change brings easy adaptation to all phases of life.

detriment.advice: Your impatience with life’s timing makes you inventive in finding ways to force the pace.

lines.title: Witnessing
lines.subtitle: Impassively observing your world even as you move in it.
lines.text: You have a need to accept change or else live in fear of being continually overwhelmed by life.

exaltation.advice: Your deep alignment with the forces of change allows you to merge into transformation.

detriment.advice: Overwhelmed by anxiety you’ll fail to find meaning in change. A great needs to stay presente.

lines.title: Observing
lines.subtitle: Remaining calm when there is no advantage in becoming involved.
lines.text: If you remember your inner serenity you have the clarity to commit to an experience or not.

exaltation.advice: You have the sense to retreat rather than commit to experiences that are destabilizing.

detriment.advice: You tend to rush into situations that have little merit, only to be overwhelmed by them.

lines.title: Unshakeable
lines.subtitle: Steadfast in your belief that everything works out as it should.
lines.text: Rather than be overwhelmed, you can retreat and wait for your own time of strength to come.

exaltation.advice: Saving your energy during times of recession, in readiness for any change in fortunes.

detriment.advice: By submitting to any beliefs in personal failure, you can lose trust in yourself.

lines.title: Dis-connecting
lines.subtitle: The uplifting sense of quick recovery when you retreat.
lines.text: Putting aside any fears and anxieties, yor realize the advantages in retreating.

exaltation.advice: Your expansive nature recognizes the great benefits in having times to yourself.

detriment.advice: Your personal compulsion to be private at any cost will easily estrange others.

lines.title: Detaching
lines.subtitle: Avoiding unnecessary constraints. (A potential to access past lives).
lines.text: Watching life on many levels, your inner stillness craves external calm.

exaltation.advice: You honor your sometimes dramatic need to retreat for regeneration and resurgence.

detriment.advice: If you lose touch with the present you can be swept up in all kinds of confusing scenarios.

lines.title: Being-self-protective
lines.subtitle: The independence and clarity to disengage.
lines.text: You either are clear in your need for privacy, or lose your poise through being overly helpful.
