exaltation.advice: You sense the importance of privacy and secrecy until the time is right to engage others.

detriment.advice: Randomly sharing yourself and your secrets brings you problems in the resulting confusion.

lines.title: Letting go!
lines.subtitle: Moving on from moment to moment, from one scene to the next.
lines.text: Being objective you take care to be refreshed and ready for all new experiences.

exaltation.advice: Your bright nature is free from doubts and concern about letting go of needless burdens.

detriment.advice: Your overgenerous nature is unable to completely let go and risks becoming codependent.

lines.title: Being Presumptive
lines.subtitle: Haphazard, sometimes clumsy use of power.
lines.text: Using power well comes from your inner strength or calming reaction its use causes in others.

exaltation.advice: You have the discipline to control how you use power by examining your motives.

detriment.advice: Personal transformation usually comes through reaction to your use of power.

lines.title: Being temperate
lines.subtitle: Resistance lessens when you apply power carefully.
lines.text: In times of success you either increase or lose your respect for others.

exaltation.advice: You have the energy to continue in your efforts especially when success is sure.

detriment.advice: Always seeking admiration for your achievements saps your inner strength.

lines.title: Estimating
lines.subtitle: Using power in accordance with prevailing conditions.
lines.text: Using your power discreetly, or being overly zealous and attracting complications.

exaltation.advice: You have the self-discipline to use your power in proportion to the situations at hand.

detriment.advice: By fabricating roles for how to use your power you find yourself reacting to reality.

lines.title: Inner Strength
lines.subtitle: Maintaining inner balance assures achievement.
lines.text: Trusting or doubting your inner clarity results in the success or failure of any effort.

exaltation.advice: You power through any situation by aligning with your inner clarity and confidence.

detriment.advice: The potential for the abuse of power comes by ignoring your personal integrity.

lines.title: Accepting
lines.subtitle: Nothing to prove in your easy use of power.
lines.text: Seeing how your power affects others, you either embrace this or are uncomfortable with it.

exaltation.advice: You have the strength and persistence to use power appropriately and when necessary.

detriment.advice: Being moody affects your consistent use of power and results in you being hesitant.

lines.title: Being Careful
lines.subtitle: Having the wisdom to reassess.
lines.text: Your discriminate or indiscriminate use of power means outcomes are harmonious or not.

exaltation.advice: You learn ways to adapt your use of power to maintain stability in any situation.

detriment.advice: Any extravagant use of your power may cause exhaustion for everyone around you.

lines.title: Holding Steady
lines.subtitle: Accepting setbacks of life’s process.
lines.text: Whether you see yourself as right or not it is always possible to take rejection personally.

exaltation.advice: Your inner harmony sees negation as a sign to refine your perception of experiences.

detriment.advice: It is easy for you to take any form of rejection as a personal failure and humiliation.

lines.title: Growing
lines.subtitle: Every interaction brings potentially new experiences.
lines.text: Sometimes your endeavors are held back until you are available to receive assistance.

exaltation.advice: Inner balance and virtue help you cope with unproductive times until your inspiration returns.

detriment.advice: In a state of moodiness you can insist on progress whether the timing is right or not.

lines.title: Combining
lines.subtitle: Sharing experiences with others.
lines.text: Evolution comes when you fully experience life in the company and trust of others.

exaltation.advice: Your expansive nature brings progressive change to your own and others’ lives.

detriment.advice: You tend to take a pivotal role in everything often disregarding other people’s roles.

lines.title: Being Impulsive
lines.subtitle: The yearning to demand progress at any cost.
lines.text: Check you Authority when you are pushing for experiences without any obvious goals in sight.

exaltation.advice: Your inner integrity recognizes the significance of change and the opportunities it brings.

detriment.advice: You push for excitement at any opportunity, sometimes precipitating crises.

lines.title: Being Honorable
lines.subtitle: Tempering expectations in favor of progress.
lines.text: You enhance experiences by giving of yourself, whether you feel personally benefited or not.

exaltation.advice: you try to benefit everyone you involve in your life through your experience.

detriment.advice: Your generosity brings expansion for everyone, often without a sense of personal fulfillment.

lines.title: Self-examining
lines.subtitle: A readiness to reexamine and realing your outward feelings.
lines.text: Regretting any experience impels you to modify your ways, simply or with a complete overhaul.

exaltation.advice: You have the self discipline to be fair with others when you implement change in their lives.

detriment.advice: Your drive to instruct other people in ways that charge their lives can be unpopular.

lines.title: Enduring
lines.subtitle: Reflecting inwards when challenged by outer circumstances.
lines.text: Accepting or ignoring your feelings and holding true to yourself or not in critical times.

exaltation.advice: You manage to handle emotional turmoil even while restraining your impulsive tendencies.

detriment.advice: If you magnify and externalize small difficulties you end up in constant turmoil.

lines.title: Being Constant
lines.subtitle: Being loyal when challenged in the company of others.
lines.text: Personal setbacks can give you the stimulation to help and receive from others.

exaltation.advice: you apply your imagination to further yourself and others through crisis situations.

detriment.advice: Any moodiness makes you vacillate in seeking or providing assistance during crises.

lines.title: Breaking Out
lines.subtitle: Finding the point of transition from darkness to light.
lines.text: you shift from crisis to resolution when you witness emotional habits that don’t serve you.

exaltation.advice: A transformative process in which you ride emotional crises to find your personal clarity.

detriment.advice: You feel the great benefits of change but are reluctant to be done with old emotion.

lines.title: Surveying
lines.subtitle: Accessing your way by following your own light through all situations.
lines.text: Your way through life depends on your accessing your own inner clarity, or not, in all crises.

exaltation.advice: You appreciate that secret and esoteric knowledge can help in resolving volatile situations.

detriment.advice: Your inner ability to see beyond obvious concerns and issues can assist anyone in crisis.

lines.title: Shielding
lines.subtitle: Hiding your intention from insensitive eyes.
lines.text: Enduring disagreeable situations intelligently leads you to eventual fortune.

exaltation.advice: Transformation is possible for you when you find the way to thrive in intense experiences.

detriment.advice: Confusing yourself and others you seek to resolve emotion scenarios with mental solutions.

lines.title: Being Resolved
lines.subtitle: Committing to persist in what is right.
lines.text: Darkness is an absence of light. When truth is revealed all aspects of untruth begin to dissipate.

exaltation.advice: Your powerful alignment with pure emotion brings natural healing and transformation.

detriment.advice: Your reluctance to resolve crises makes you persist in finding some problems or another.

lines.title: Revering
lines.subtitle: Respect and honor is due to the innately wise.
lines.text: Being considerate in your own attitudes encourages others to be attentive in theirs.

exaltation.advice: Through harmony and friendliness you provide a solid basis for all relationships.

detriment.advice: If you take a competitive stance you can lose your inherent friendliness and compatibility.

lines.title: Being Self-sufficient
lines.subtitle: Achievements are enhanced through synergy.
lines.text: You endorse personal responsibility as the foundation for a community's strength.

exaltation.advice: By taking full responsibility for your own life, you profoundly alter the would around you.

detriment.advice: You might attempt to save the world by emphasizing the shortcomings of others.

lines.title: Moderating
lines.subtitle: A steady reserve supports communal well-being.
lines.text: In disagreements there is a need for authority and fairness to bring the family back together.

exaltation.advice: Your expansive and generous sensitivity supports open and clear relationships.

detriment.advice: Emotional imbalance makes you more concerned to keep order than acknowledge feelings.

lines.title: Enriching
lines.subtitle: Supporting the family’s prosperity.
lines.text: You emphasize that the well-being of families involves everyone’s presence and contributions.

exaltation.advice: You further the well-being of your world through all clear contributions.

detriment.advice: Your particular view of family is prone to approve only traditional ways and views.

lines.title: Being Loyal
lines.subtitle: Natural and magnanimous devotion to the family.
lines.text: You forgive all transgressions within the family unless you feed that you are being used.

exaltation.advice: Your selfless affection enhances the love and harmony felt among everyone around you.

detriment.advice: You can lean on others for emotional support while still disliking any signs of dependency.

lines.title: Being Astute
lines.subtitle: Holding high personal standards encourages others to do the same.
lines.text: Being true to your own feeling of responsibility ensures your ability to benefit everyone.

exaltation.advice: You recognize and enhance all the qualities of life possible through harmonious friendships.

detriment.advice: Your restless nature often craves diverse friendships beyond the boundaries of the family.

lines.title: Being Impartial
lines.subtitle: No need to worry when a situation can resolve itself.
lines.text: Do you need be concerned with every complication in life, or want to struggle anyway?

exaltation.advice: Deep attunement to your inner guidance knows when and how to deal with discomforts.

detriment.advice: Your drive to continuously fight with life causes you eventually to expand your intuition.

lines.title: Being Courteous
lines.subtitle: A spirit of conciliation furthers your purpose.
lines.text: Being relaxed in your attitude to others allows for the possibility to intuit your own purpose.

exaltation.advice: Transformation happens in diverse situations through you forcing yourself to be amenable.

detriment.advice: Your moodiness will accommodate others only grudgingly when you are challenged.

lines.title: Being Tenacious
lines.subtitle: Accepting challenges as a part of your growth.
lines.text: Staying true to you know and who you trust aligns you in your quest for life’s meaning.

exaltation.advice: Contending with many difficulties you follow your own way to personal empowerment.

detriment.advice: Being caught in contention as a way of life drains you and your helpers of all resources.

lines.title: Rejoining
lines.subtitle: Turning away from being isolated in the face of adversity.
lines.text: Trusting in your own process you can receive assistance during seemingly impossible situations.

exaltation.advice: You can hold out for the bright flash of opportunity that transforms everything.

detriment.advice: Beset by outside pressures, it’s as though you have to struggle against the whole world.

lines.title: Actualizing
lines.subtitle: Penetrating through misunderstandings by connecting with company.
lines.text: You intuit when to stop and see who will help, or you can persist in your apparent isolation.

exaltation.advice: You have discipline to stop and review your contentious stance and recognize your allies.

detriment.advice: Transformation happens when you are first isolated then supported in personal struggles.

lines.title: Mis-trusting
lines.subtitle: Fighting with shadows.
lines.text: Dealing with diversity takes time and your willingness. Fighting with life itself is also possible.

exaltation.advice: Your disciplined nature embraces life after examining your constant tendency to struggle.

detriment.advice: If you identify with struggle due to a distrust of the world, you amplify needless tension.

lines.title: Being Detechead
lines.subtitle: Dropping any need for forced interactions.
lines.text: Whether you engage with anyone directly or not, often you provoke people without trying.

exaltation.advice: you have the means to avoid any imposed obstacles by acting in your own way and time.

detriment.advice: Your indecision about when and how to deal with obstacles can make others hopping mad.

lines.title: Encountering
lines.subtitle: Engaging adversity as a means to sell-discovery.
lines.text: You learn to ‘Grab the bull by the horns,’ whether it feels comfortable to do so or not.

exaltation.advice: You naturally provoke life, so you are constantly called on to meet situations face to face.

detriment.advice: Feeling intense discomfort with stressful upsets, you tend to seek alternative possibilities.

lines.title: Facing Challenge
lines.subtitle: Honoring your own way of dealing with trials.
lines.text: Reconsidering or not, your internal push to engage with or avoid external confrontations.

exaltation.advice: Your expansive stance does not absorb or give off a sense of fear when in confrontations.

detriment.advice: Justifying how you confront all obstacles you limit the possibility for fresh. alternatives.

lines.title: Converging
lines.subtitle: Finding unifying elements before taking any action.
lines.text: Awaiting right opportunities to handle confrontations is not always the easiest thing for you.

exaltation.advice: By perceiving the essence of obstructions you find the energy to deal with them.

detriment.advice: You tend to tackle confrontations regardless of circumstances or outcomes.

lines.title: Finding Assistance
lines.subtitle: By facing obstacles directly, help become available.
lines.text: You either allow yourself to find assistance in difficult times or stay doggedly self-sulficient.

exaltation.advice: You somehow draw any assistance you need to find ways to bypass all obstacles.

detriment.advice: Your insistence to take on confrontation as a permanent agenda is exasperating to others.

lines.title: Troubleshooting
lines.subtitle: The natural girl for solving problems.
lines.text: Some people enjoy having their problems, so fixing their problems can really upset them.

exaltation.advice: You are sensitive to the overall needs of situations before attempting to solve any problems.

detriment.advice: If you always take on problems regardless of facts you can end up causing greater problems.

lines.title: Recovering
lines.subtitle: The prime need for a hard-working heart is rest.
lines.text: After any achievements is complete, you can best consolidate your situation by resting.

exaltation.advice: Your find ways to enjoy your aloneness and find relaxation after exertion.

detriment.advice: Your changing moods can make you question your achievements and miss the call to rest.

lines.title: Being Conclusive
lines.subtitle: Moving beyond potentially limiting life qualities.
lines.text: Clearly finding your own way in tricky situations assures your ability to handle any disruptions.

exaltation.advice: You have the natural willingness to be true to yourself, regardless of distractions.

detriment.advice: Your sensibility makes it hard to avoid the situations that hamper your very freedom.

lines.title: Being Whole
lines.subtitle: Matching your lifestyle with your unruffled inner being.
lines.text: If you make a display of ego willpower you easily attract problematic company and situations.

exaltation.advice: You have an ability to ‘go it alone’ and induce transformation through the use of willpower.

detriment.advice: Any drive involving your ego expression will get you the king of attention you do not want!

lines.title: Reality checks
lines.subtitle: Honestly viewing a tendency to include unrealistic partnerships.
lines.text: Perception change constantly and you need to drop all alliances that limit your freedom.

exaltation.advice: You bypass problems when you only encourage those who have similar aspirations to you.

detriment.advice: you may persist with old friendships and habits long after their relevance is exhausted.

lines.title: Liberating
lines.subtitle: Being clear in your separation from outside interference.
lines.text: In a world full of hazards you require that all of your associations are supportive and relevant.

exaltation.advice: You have the confidence to let go of relationships that hamper your freedom.

detriment.advice: You trade your liberation for the support of people who often interfere in your life.

lines.title: Definitive Stance
lines.subtitle: Freedom is realized through conclusive removal of obstacles.
lines.text: You overcome your own reluctance to be free and remove anyone and anything impeding you.

exaltation.advice: Your clear conviction purposely removes all barriers that hamper your liberation.

detriment.advice: Removing obstacles as a role in life can cause you to use unnecessarily severe measures.

lines.title: Moderating
lines.subtitle: Finding the balance between giving and receiving.
lines.text: Being either centered and clear, or headstrong in your handlings of how you use your energies.

exaltation.advice: Your creative imagination streams resources in ways that benefit yourself and others.

detriment.advice: Confusion with your role resources leads you into difficulties at the outside of endeavors.

lines.title: Giving and Receiving
lines.subtitle: Being recognized for the services you render.
lines.text: By indulging others without diminishing yourself, you find rewards in fulfilling endeavors.

exaltation.advice: You have the discipline to watch out for yourself while considering others’ needs.

detriment.advice: By demanding attention and reward for assisting others you eventually diminish yourself.

lines.title: Synergizing
lines.subtitle: Experiences are fulfilling because of right alliances.
lines.text: In all your life experiences there’s a need to select suitable company and essential resources.

exaltation.advice: You choose partnerships that endure through times of separation and aloneness.

detriment.advice: Your changeable nature seeks mixed company to share in your resources and dreams.

lines.title: Examining Shortcomings
lines.subtitle: Diminishing your poor habits increases your fortunes.
lines.text: By acknowledging what does not fulfill, you begin to attract fresh resources and experiences.

exaltation.advice: Having humidity to clear up your personal problems opens the way for assistance to come.

detriment.advice: You might unrealistically expect assistance from others to rectify your own shortcomings.

lines.title: Being Recognized
lines.subtitle: Inner clarity ensures rewards.
lines.text: Watching how you and others deal with constraints, whether you find completion or not.

exaltation.advice: You push to clarity the essential attitudes thain will promote your fullness of purpose.

detriment.advice: You tend to see a half full glass as half empty, despite senseng how fortunate you are.

lines.title: Being Fulfilled
lines.subtitle: Bringing benefits to others while expanding your own resources.
lines.text: You enrich everyone though your inner watchfulness and your selection ways.

exaltation.advice: Your disciplined view enhances your own resources and also brings expansion for others.

detriment.advice: You tend to avoid public attention but have the power to shift constraints into great gains.

lines.title: Accomplishing
lines.subtitle: Great deest are possible.
lines.text: You question confidence to expand in many directions on behalf of yourself and others.

exaltation.advice: You align with an inner confidence and certainty that grows in all areas of life.

detriment.advice: Becoming distracted by the needs of others you can end up”spreading yourself too thin.”

lines.title: Blessing
lines.subtitle: Inner attunement with what is beneficial.
lines.text: Being steadfast in sustaining your clear intentions you receive tangential benefits.

exaltation.advice: By recognizing your way and staying true to it you find much reward and acclaim

detriment.advice: Unless watchful, you are easily overwhelmed by the effects of others’ demands.

lines.title: Being Competent
lines.subtitle: Great wisdom is gained by learning from your ordeals.
lines.text: There is nothing that cannot grow, if you patiently persevere with clarity.

exaltation.advice: An unshakable certainty comes when you move gracefully through all trials and adversity.

detriment.advice: You may embrace moodiness that easily throws you into despair when problems arise.

lines.title: Being Trustworthy
lines.subtitle: Giving sensible counsel that serves one and all.
lines.text: Your opportunist nature often finds you meditating the fulfillment of growth for everyone.

exaltation.advice: When you consider all aspects of growth you find the way for greatest accomplishments.

detriment.advice: Immaturity may place great importance in company that in the company’s achievements.

lines.title: Being Kindhearted
lines.subtitle: Unselfish and clear aspirations bring fulfillment.
lines.text: Acknowledgment is gained through your achievements in both personal and shared endeavors.

exaltation.advice: Your inner strength and confident kindness benefits everyone in sustaining their growth.

detriment.advice: You place sincerity and sympathy with others as more important than your own growth.

lines.title: Balancing
lines.subtitle: Maintaining a good mixture of giving and taking.
lines.text: Successful step imply flourishing outcomes so long as you honor yourself and your journey.

exaltation.advice: You are sensible to sharing your own growth with others, ensuring the benefit of everyone.

detriment.advice: Remaining stuck in your own growth you may actually proceed to deplete everyone else.

lines.title: Being Vigilant
lines.subtitle: No need to rush blindly into employing new insights.
lines.text: Your resignation and intent are needed to replace old ways and implement any new insight.

exaltation.advice: You need strong resolve to implement transformation from your insights.

detriment.advice: You have aesthetic admiration but sometimes it is difficulty in implementing your insights.

lines.title: Being Resolute
lines.subtitle: A clear mind gives access to clear outcomes.
lines.text: Staying true or not to your way of relating insights affects whether they ever become a reality.

exaltation.advice: You have an inbuilt means to assimilate insights that facilitates personal transformation.

detriment.advice: You tend to be actively engaged in avoiding who might complicate your life.

lines.title: Being Resilient
lines.subtitle: Stating your ground in implementing your way.
lines.text: Your own resolve or insecurity relating to your personal insights, affects all facets of your life.

exaltation.advice: When aligned with your insights you resist any criticism in achieving your purpose.

detriment.advice: You can become unsure of the soundness of your insights when challenged by others.

lines.title: Being Restless
lines.subtitle: If you are unable to hear sage advice you remain indecisive.
lines.text: It is hard to surrender to life circumstances when your mind emphatically craves charge.

exaltation.advice: you recognize the need to be objective when you consider implementing your insights.

detriment.advice: If you insist on implementing insights that are obviously not feasible, you will be distressed.

lines.title: Being Forthright
lines.subtitle: Implementing any new insights requires great thoroughness.
lines.text: You grow through implementing your personal insights, or succumb to irrelevant input.

exaltation.advice: You have a sensibility to know the condition in which your personal insights will work out.

detriment.advice: You have a hopeful expectation that others will readily agree with your fresh insights.

lines.title: Redirecting
lines.subtitle: Fostering acceptable and practical growth from insights.
lines.text: Your careful objectivity ensures that your insights will lead towards lasting transformation.

exaltation.advice: You utilize your objectivity to review your insights and assure they are useful to others.

detriment.advice: If you are attached only to the brilliance of your insights you may easily become ostracized.

lines.title: Being Alert
lines.subtitle: Watching all internal sensation while interactive with others.
lines.text: You either pay attention to your instinctive warnings or ignore them and endure the outcomes.

exaltation.advice: Your vigilance gauges potential complications and rearranges them for your own benefit.

detriment.advice: If you are overly moderate towards disturbing situations you will eventually falter.

lines.title: Being Conscientious
lines.subtitle: Watching any impulse to give yourself away.
lines.text: When you restrain any impulses to act carelessly you can easily handle situations clearly.

exaltation.advice: Your alertness to changing patterns gives you an easy tolerance in confronting anything.

detriment.advice: Your breast way of interaction may cause you to ignore your hunches and lose perspective.

lines.title: Holding back
lines.subtitle: Recognizing an occasional need to hesitate in asserting yourself.
lines.text: Trusting your instincts or needing to impress others, makes you clear or not in your actions.

exaltation.advice: With instinctive confidence and drive you can handle tricky people and difficult situations.

detriment.advice: You often misinterpret situations and this may cause you to be confused by others’ egos.

lines.title: Forbearing
lines.subtitle: Finding tolerance in your interactions with others.
lines.text: Being clear with your own internations or not, allows for your ever to have anyone else’s support.

exaltation.advice: You have clear relations with others by engaging with them as part of your vital reality.

detriment.advice: You often assume assistance from people despite your previously being distant towards them.

lines.title: Integrating
lines.subtitle: Upholding a presence that is exemplary.
lines.text: You align with the laws of nature and high integrity, or take advantage if you can.

exaltation.advice: Your brilliance shines through your principles and virtue, setting a a clear example.

detriment.advice: for all.

lines.title: Withdrawing
lines.subtitle: Protecting yourself from becoming overwhelmed.
lines.text: Distancing yourself from cpmplex situation ensures your own well being but attracts criticism.

exaltation.advice: You move through tough situation advantageously while maintaining others’ support.

detriment.advice: If you take yourself too seriously you will miss much of the fun that life offers.

lines.title: Blending
lines.subtitle: Finding common ground with others before moving forwards.
lines.text: Your openness and firmness in any leadership role encourages the backing of those being led.

exaltation.advice: Your clear inner intent expands your ability to receive material and spiritual assistance.

detriment.advice: Being naturally attractive to others you can become overwhelmed by their problems.

lines.title: contributing
lines.subtitle: Trusting in the guidance and company you attract.
lines.text: Being open or closed in the company you attract measures the blessings that you receive.

exaltation.advice: Your natural attunement to your company opens the way for unexpected blessings.

detriment.advice: You tend to “go it alone” rather than appreciate the blessing that your company brings.

lines.title: Separating
lines.subtitle: Proceeding in life without obvious support or common accord.
lines.text: You Either discover how to gather resources and support or find troubles that create hardship.

exaltation.advice: Your deep attunement to the workings within a hierarchy intuits how to gain resources.

detriment.advice: Disappointed not finding common accord, you might ask: “Do i truly want to be involved?”

lines.title: Being Brave
lines.subtitle: Selflessly striving to accomplish benefits for one and all.
lines.text: You attract others by proceeding towards a larger than personal goal.

exaltation.advice: Your inner alignment with a higher sense of purpose assists everyone on the material plane.

detriment.advice: Your boldness to achieve individual material success can also benefit other people.

lines.title: Being Virtuous
lines.subtitle: The virtues that attract the confidence of others.
lines.text: Your attitudes of independence or entitlement affect the way in which you are perceived.

exaltation.advice: Your innovative approach to leadership is naturally attractive to other people.

detriment.advice: Assuming a grandiose approach to leading others you must be practical to be effective.

lines.title: Being Self-dependent
lines.subtitle: Trusting that you receive what you need.
lines.text: You remain unfazed by others’ attitudes, or capitulate when challenged materially.

exaltation.advice: Relying on your inner independence you succeed despite employing unorthodox techniques.

detriment.advice: Taking ‘failure’ personally you’ll find regrets. You are reminded to count your blessings!

lines.title: Promoting
lines.subtitle: Inner conviction is recognized by those who seek to align with you.
lines.text: Your inherent confidence or a lack of readiness to grow either attracts assistance or not.

exaltation.advice: Your personal commitment to your life ensures you grow in both obvious and unseen waus.

detriment.advice: If you insist on developing solely by your own efforts you might miss some potential allies.

lines.title: Expanding
lines.subtitle: Like it or not, the eyas are on you and you can deliver!
lines.text: Even with modest resources and without others’ approval you grow though just being you.

exaltation.advice: Success is assured by your clear sincerity, coupled with your bright nature.

detriment.advice: Striving ambitiously for recognition and success, you may not be appreciated by others.

lines.title: Progressing
lines.subtitle: Moving upwards in life without doubts.
lines.text: When proceeding into the unknown, you need not hesitate so long as you are clear in yourself.

exaltation.advice: You advance easily in life through your inner attunement to all phases of your journey.

detriment.advice: Finding little resistance in life you may try to advance by using unsuccessful associations.

lines.title: Fulfilling
lines.subtitle: Holding true to your inner commitment to grow.
lines.text: Being recognized for your commitment to grow in life allows for easy advancement.

exaltation.advice: Taking growth in your stride, you are furthered in life by receiving the trust of others.

detriment.advice: Believing growth to be part of life’s process you may fail to acknowledge those who assist.

lines.title: Proceeding
lines.subtitle: A naturally powerful development needs strong inner virtue.
lines.text: You are growing in your journey through life whether you see visible signs of progress or not.

exaltation.advice: Maintaining your balance in all phases of life allows for successful and lasting growth.

detriment.advice: Getting lost in imagination distracts you from a consistency that is needed for sure growth.

lines.title: Appraising
lines.subtitle: Compulsive advancement requires constant vigilance.
lines.text: Reviewing your life’s efforts you determine who and what receives your energy and attention.

exaltation.advice: When you always relate realistically to your life you are available to interact with others.

detriment.advice: Trusting only in your spiritual qualities you can be unaligned with the need of the moment.

lines.title: Reviewing
lines.subtitle: The truth is constant but sometimes remains hidden from us.
lines.text: By Mental self-examination you remove useless beliefs or else risk feeling Overwhelmed.

exaltation.advice: Your meditative quality watches the mind and filters out self-defeating through patterns.

detriment.advice: An unrealistic sense of hope links you to an over-reliance on the mind’s grasp of life.

lines.title: Being Fortunate
lines.subtitle: Aligning with resonant furthers your journey.
lines.text: Outer disputes can easily become inner ones, unless you sidestep others’ discords altogether.

exaltation.advice: Inner stability keeps you apart from your mind’s constant comparison mechanism.

detriment.advice: With an uncertain mind it is important you make decisions by accessing your Authority.

lines.title: Being Confused
lines.subtitle: A purely mental viewpoint can be unrealistically restrictive.
lines.text: Constantly thinking things are worse than they really are is an easy way to become depressed.

exaltation.advice: Relaxing in deep trust in yourself and Existence allows truth to be finally revealed to you!

detriment.advice: Attempting to justify your life purpose though your thoughts fuels a deep discontentment.

lines.title: Holding Focus
lines.subtitle: Maintaining your way in a confused world.
lines.text: Being persistent you find your way among others’ fossilized and poor views, or else you give up.

exaltation.advice: your meditative approach picks out apparently fixed agendas and obsolete belief systems.

detriment.advice: Your Attunement with many diverse possible views in life can lead to personal confusion.

lines.title: Endorsing
lines.subtitle: Making sense out of apparently impossible scenarios.
lines.text: Remaining steadfast regardless of how situations appear at first, you bring joy and relief for all.

exaltation.advice: The realization of Universal harmony that includes everyone, even your detractors.

detriment.advice: The truth will become apparent if you honor your clear principles.

lines.title: Being Remorseful
lines.subtitle: A nagging sense of ‘what’s the point?A call to go beyond the mind.
lines.text: You cannot expect to think your way through life and live life fully at the same time.

exaltation.advice: By constant self examination you realize that your mind is limited in making sense of life.

detriment.advice: Struck with multiple, often irrelevant considerations, you will find it to move on in life.

lines.title: Finding Significance
lines.subtitle: Quick recognition of relevance or irrelevance in your life.
lines.text: You either adjust to each fresh moment or find life distasteful and become distracted.

exaltation.advice: You have a natural attunement with all manner of gifts that life brings to you.

detriment.advice: Making problems out of nothing you find it hard to be satisfied with life’s simple pleasures.

lines.title: Deteriorating
lines.subtitle: The need to constantly refresh your gifts.
lines.text: Your talents deteriorate when ignored or if you are distracted by comparing yourself to others.

exaltation.advice: You transform your abilities by growing in and around the challenges that life brings.

detriment.advice: you are careless in practicing your gifts when you are distracted by other influences in your life.

lines.title: Acknowledging
lines.subtitle: Trusting in your adaptable gifts.
lines.text: Sooner or later you are appreciated for your talents and abilities if you trust and persevere.

exaltation.advice: You have the endurance to expand your gifts so that they are appreciated by one and all.

detriment.advice: Being fearful and worried that you may be overwhelmed can contribute to being overlooked.

lines.title: Refreshing
lines.subtitle: All your gifts benefit from regular reevaluation and refreshment.
lines.text: In rest, refreshment and reevaluation your inner depth and clarity are explored and expanded.

exaltation.advice: You put your own life in order as a priority, really for openings to extend into others’ lives.

detriment.advice: You tend to over-identity with projects that exhaust you when they hit snags.

lines.title: Utilizing
lines.subtitle: Recognizing that you have many gifts, but also the need to apply them.
lines.text: Using your abilities towards great benefits requires that you remain clear to each moment.

exaltation.advice: By savoring each moment, you appreciate the gifts that most easily benefit everyone.

detriment.advice: If you question your own gift and adopt others’ ways, you’ll be unfulfilled by your deeds.

lines.title: Replenishing
lines.subtitle: Fulfillment comes through sharing from an overflowing source.
lines.text: Great fulfillment comes from the openness to share your extensive gifts with others.

exaltation.advice: Harmonizing your world through sharing your source of understanding and talents.

detriment.advice: Moodiness and uncertainty can cause you to be coaxed by others people to share your gifts.

lines.title: Awaiting Right Timing
lines.subtitle: Conserving your energy until you have clarity.
lines.text: Noticing many changing potentials you have the awareness to wait for right circumstances.

exaltation.advice: Your honorable behavior in every all situation fosters your growth.

detriment.advice: Inducing idealistic changes can cause you to be continually justifying yourself.

lines.title: Being Firm
lines.subtitle: Envisioning right outcomes for changes.
lines.text: Recognizing that charge is needed, you eight hold to film principles or act for change’s sake.

exaltation.advice: Your grounded disposition holds you in your principles when times of change come.

detriment.advice: Chaotic circumstances can cause you to overturn everything that appear already resolved.

lines.title: Informing
lines.subtitle: Finding the support of other people in times of change.
lines.text: In times of upheaval there needs to be mutual agreement for everyone to be ready for changes.

exaltation.advice: Your sensitivity relates to the principles of change and informs others of what is happening.

detriment.advice: Getting caught up in the drama of change you become insensitive to the needs of others.

lines.title: Making Reay
lines.subtitle: Accumulating energy and motivation for radical changes.
lines.text: Sincerely aligning with your truth, or simply being opportunistic, you enrich or deplete society.

exaltation.advice: Your expanded overview of society’s needs allows you to implement changes that benefit all.

detriment.advice: Your forceful nature can take advantage over others during times of upheaval.

lines.title: Being Sentient
lines.subtitle: The inner feelings for the rightness of changes.
lines.text: Seeing a need for change, you support others with their approval or in order to control them.

exaltation.advice: You align everyone in ways that make it easier to transition though upheavals.

detriment.advice: Your impatience with others can drive you to attempt to force change on them.

lines.title: Appreciating
lines.subtitle: Content to expand on previous changes.
lines.text: With all changes, further growth is possible when everyone adjusts to the new circumstances.

exaltation.advice: Appreciating yourself and others supports everyone to drop the old and grow with the new.

detriment.advice: If you seek perfection in transitioning situations it can be hard for others to feed appreciated.

lines.title: Starting Afresh
lines.subtitle: Eliminating old qualities before honoring new ones.
lines.text: Being clear that adopted values may no longer be appropriate in your life and community.

exaltation.advice: The drive for refinement compels you to use any means to achieve your ends.

detriment.advice: Dissatisfaction with all your original values, opens a tendency to borrow others’ values.

lines.title: Standing firm
lines.subtitle: Avoiding tempting distractions from your natural way.
lines.text: Being firm in your values or giving in to outside pressures, you always accept the consequences.

exaltation.advice: Being strong to uphold your values mirrors your inner calm no matter how others react.

lines.title: Clarifying
lines.subtitle: Be clear that you recognize and honor your own true values first.
lines.text: Honoring your own values you receive the support you need, but may regret being assisted.

exaltation.advice: Being aware that you require support, you establish the values needed to receive it.

detriment.advice: You might be overly mental in balancing your values with your need for acceptance.

lines.title: Qualifying
lines.subtitle: Presence is needed in upholding right values in sorry circumstances.
lines.text: In all situations, values need to correspond to the real requirements of the present moment.

exaltation.advice: A meditative quality ensures your values are in accord with the need of every occasion.

detriment.advice: Your drive to expound unformed values to achieve a result can cause chaos.

lines.title: Enhancing
lines.subtitle: Maintaining alertness to recognize which values serve best.
lines.text: You recognize or disregard a correction between the values and actions that serve everyone.

exaltation.advice: You grow wise enough to uphold appropriate values when pressured to change them.

detriment.advice: In a rush to get no in life, you can disregard the real values that serve yourself and others.

lines.title: Invigorating
lines.subtitle: Consistently supporting the values that serve one and all.
lines.text: You set an example with clarity and wisdom, whether you relate closely with others or not.

exaltation.advice: The strength of your inner harmony compels others to realize the essential values in life.

detriment.advice: Your occasionally moody nature can allow your clarity to become obscured by trifles.

lines.title: Arousing
lines.subtitle: Growing through disruptions of all kinds.
lines.text: Dramatic change can be alarming until you accept all of the transformations it brings.

exaltation.advice: Transformation is your nature and you find a relative ease adapting to dramatic situations.

detriment.advice: You are very sensitive to shocks and the upsets they bring, often wishing to avoid them.

lines.title: Surviving
lines.subtitle: Recognizing temporary upsets for what they are: temporary.
lines.text: Everything comes around, and if you wait patiently, you transcend shock and apparent defeat.

exaltation.advice: You confidently take well-timed, evasive action in overwhelming situations.

detriment.advice: Mental indecision will often cause you to miss the right time to act in shocking situations.

lines.title: Being Composed
lines.subtitle: Learning to honor the laws of nature.
lines.text: In times of shock you either grow through calmly realigning with the inherent changes, or not.

exaltation.advice: The power to deal with disruption is linked to your ability to calmly find a way through it.

detriment.advice: You may take shocks as a personal affront to your ego that compels you to struggle with life.

lines.title: Being Unstructured
lines.subtitle: Beyond habitual reactions………. “Going outside the box.”
lines.text: Dramatic times bring opportunities that you either grasp or fumble.

exaltation.advice: Your spiritual warrior is thrilled by shocking events and takes on all challenges.

detriment.advice: Trying to master intense drama and shock with your mental programs can cause chaos.

lines.title: Being Reliable
lines.subtitle: Accepting all the changes that repeated shocks bring.
lines.text: You reach your goals by following your inner guidance through all manner of disruptions.

exaltation.advice: You have the inner strength to find your own and others’ truth in all extreme situations.

detriment.advice: You may become so engaged with fixing disruptions that you lose track of your journey.

lines.title: Regenerating
lines.subtitle: The phoenix rises from the ashes anew.
lines.text: Shock brings you dramatic shifts from old accords, beliefs, and understanding to new ones.

exaltation.advice: Your nature is to endure, grow and even flourish through all forms of intense challenges.

detriment.advice: You identify with great disruptions and disasters, often in life or death circumstances.

lines.title: Pause before acting
lines.subtitle: Inner stillness is sufficient unto itself.
lines.text: Your firmness to always act appropriately or anxiety to act anyhow, affects everything in life.

exaltation.advice: At ease in life, you are able to pause for personal reflection before doing anything.

detriment.advice: Your restlessness has difficulty in waiting, and often commits you to unrealistic causes.

lines.title: Be still and Know
lines.subtitle: Releasing fears and concerns around your apparent inaction.
lines.text: When attracted by outside influences it is important to remain true to your own way.

exaltation.advice: You pause for clarity in which you see your outer reality as a reflection of your inner being.

detriment.advice: You can easily get swept up in all manner of events that do not serve you entirely.

lines.title: Being Resigned
lines.subtitle: Inner composure in times when nothing needed to happen.
lines.text: you resist action to accumulate unnecessary resources, or become pressured and resentful.

exaltation.advice: Your meditative nature allows you to pause to recoup your energy and review your purpose.

detriment.advice: Pressured into attunement to find harmony in restrictive circumstances, you’ll find little.

lines.title: Keeping Still
lines.subtitle: Avoiding strong urges to act just to combat restlessness.
lines.text: You avoid reckless actions though self-materry, or tend to be frustrated when inactive.

exaltation.advice: You embrace self-mastery and personal freedom through meditation and gentle restraint.

detriment.advice: Doubting your purpose during times of inaction, you tend to try to make yourself bust.

lines.title: Being Attentive
lines.subtitle: Words and action are not necessarily the same thing.
lines.text: Being careful giving guidance or getting muddled between what you say and what gets done.

exaltation.advice: You are at ease in being reliable for what you say, and how, why and when action is needed.

detriment.advice: Outspoken comments bring transformation but also regrets when you are misunderstood.

lines.title: Meaning
lines.subtitle: Finding clarity in your inner stillness.
lines.text: Your calm appreciation comes through an inner stability unaffected by all outside.

exaltation.advice: Inner development brings the tranquility that allows you to meld into the mysteries of life.

detriment.advice: Your imaginative quality enters into the core of stillness and rests apart from the world.

lines.title: Commencing
lines.subtitle: Great progress comes from well-considered beginnings.
lines.text: You grow in life by refining your abilities to start new ventures.

exaltation.advice: Holding your vision and relying on your own strengths you grow in new life experiences.

detriment.advice: Being vulnerable to criticism from those you wish to impress dampens your development.

lines.title: Fortune Smiles
lines.subtitle: The sense of security in your growth.
lines.text: Growth can be easy and shared as long as you remain alert to your inner guidance.

exaltation.advice: A centered and expanding growth comes easily in all aspects of your life.

detriment.advice: Careless in your inner attitude you easily succumb to the pressure of unbridled growth.

lines.title: Scrutinizing
lines.subtitle: Watching your step when engaging in all new endeavors.
lines.text: Be clear that you cannot always predict the effects that your developments have on others.

exaltation.advice: Finding growth potential in all situations you draw from your inner strengths.

detriment.advice: You have potential to dissipate your energy fighting with life rather than growing in life.

lines.title: Being Agile
lines.subtitle: Finding your balance in all new situations.
lines.text: When proceeding under pressure you rely on your inner stability, or succumb to stress.

exaltation.advice: Your inner calm preserves your growth through any difficult circumstance.

detriment.advice: Pressured by the expectations of others you seek personal growth in novel situations.

lines.title: Advancing Steadily
lines.subtitle: In all expansion you are going to be pressured from outside.
lines.text: You stay true to your own measure of growth or become overwhelmed by life’s pressures.

exaltation.advice: Your deep attunement to growth comes by adapting in your own way to any situation.

detriment.advice: Becoming overly identified with a process can insulate you from your own natural growth.

lines.title: Bringing Benefit
lines.subtitle: The endless and natural gift of service to others.
lines.text: In your own growth, you emanate service and example that spreads to others’ lives.

exaltation.advice: you remain true to your own path of growth and live as a shining example for others.

detriment.advice: Embracing transformation and growth yor don’t always recognize how that affects others.

lines.title: Being Confident
lines.subtitle: Even in lowly situations, be true to yourself.
lines.text: your compete everything in your life by associating with those who lead their support

exaltation.advice: You grow in life, regardless of perceived limitations, because of your many associations.

detriment.advice: Seeking ‘politically correct’ association rather than those that may actually assist you.

lines.title: Resolving
lines.subtitle: Holding firmly to your vision of transformations.
lines.text: Having a clear perception of what you consider ‘right,’ or feeling entitled to special assistance.

exaltation.advice: It is important you maintain the quality of your interactions with those who assist you.

detriment.advice: Your occasional recklessness can make you take advantage of influential peoples in your life.

lines.title: Being Prudent
lines.subtitle: Compromising yourself is possible though indiscretion.
lines.text: You patiently avoid shortcuts to transformation or grasp every chance and find great trials.

exaltation.advice: Employing many different alliances to proceed in life you move through your limitations.

detriment.advice: You compromise yourself through relationships with anyone who might advance you in life.

lines.title: Illuminating
lines.subtitle: Acknowledging that Existence has Her plans for us.
lines.text: Transformations in its purest form, when you realize that what you want is not necessarily worth having, and then finding how to live with that. You find equanimity and the balance between the Earth and Spirit. (Each planet has its own particular interface in this line.)

lines.title: Finding Spirituality
lines.subtitle: Holding high principles in all aspects of your life.
lines.text: You are available to assist the needs of the moment and maintain stability for transformation.

exaltation.advice: With your bright nature you go out of your way to ensure that what is necessary happens.

detriment.advice: If you overly identify with mundane aspects of life you limit your potential transformation.

lines.title: Being Politically Correct
lines.subtitle: Watchful of your purpose and sincerity.
lines.text: Energizing those interactions that are essential, or just being seen to ‘do the right thing.’

exaltation.advice: Being honest in your motives you stick to respectfully advantageous relationships.

detriment.advice: Wasting energy in ‘doing the right thing’ you concede that transformation is unlikely.

lines.title: Relating
lines.subtitle: Being open and available to those of like mind and sentiment.
lines.text: You connect to others on a similar wavelength or seek out company for purely social reasons.

exaltation.advice: You promote abundance through aligning yourself with those of similar disposition.

detriment.advice: You align with others out of a concern for sociability rather than for mutually.

lines.title: Remaining Innocent
lines.subtitle: Holding your own when surrounded by skepticism.
lines.text: You provoke suspicion in others through your ideals and can be coerced by their mistrust.

exaltation.advice: Trusting your senses you align with those who live in accord with your own reality.

detriment.advice: Identifying with being considered trustworthy you are deeply shaken when challenger.

lines.title: Eclipsing
lines.subtitle: Being your best in challenging circumstances.
lines.text: You find patience and your strength of Spiritual when halted, or else you feel compelled to react.

exaltation.advice: You have the emotional discipline to survive failures without taking them too personally.

detriment.advice: You can feel failure as a personal insult and do anything to protect your deflated spirit.

lines.title: Brightening
lines.subtitle: Your inner wisdom shines out for other people in difficult times.
lines.text: You find those who truly value your spirit, and either make wise decisions, or take chances.

exaltation.advice: Your spirited nature aligns with others in making wise decisions that bring great abundance.

detriment.advice: Attracting others with your spirited nature you easily rush your decisions and cause upsets.

lines.title: Counseling
lines.subtitle: Being quite clear in the companions you have.
lines.text: Your inner harmony guarantees a magnanimous spirit and abundance for yourself and others.

exaltation.advice: Innovative in applying your ideals and the counsels of others, you provide great abundance.

detriment.advice: Engaging the counsels of others intelligently but maybe feeling conditioned and restrained.

lines.title: Being Selfless
lines.subtitle: Holding open views and much allowance for your world.
lines.text: It is easy to abandon those less fortunate than yourself if you are not watchful.

exaltation.advice: You have the discipline to use your abundance to further the lives of yourself and others.

detriment.advice: If you take yourself too seriously you will miss much of the fun that life offers.

lines.title: Being Intentional
lines.subtitle: Avoiding being disciplined and sailing through life.
lines.text: Being purposefully engaged in your life or not, qualifies the value of all of your life experiences.

exaltation.advice: Relating in your own way, in your own time, to matters of personal interest.

detriment.advice: Your speech can be mostly escapist to avoid any personal responsibility for what is said.

lines.title: Welcoming
lines.subtitle: The gift of enhancing your world if you trust in yourself.
lines.text: Attentive to the brightness in your world, you notice how life is perceived by others.

exaltation.advice: Relating innovatively in your life brings admiration and assistance in times of need.

detriment.advice: Your passion for storytelling can miss the needs and expectations of your audience.

lines.title: Being Thorough
lines.subtitle: Examining any and all fixed beliefs.
lines.text: You examine and update your beliefs, or you are careless how you associate them into your life.

exaltation.advice: You express your beliefs with conviction and you have an ability to adjust them over time.

detriment.advice: If you believe that your true harmony exists somewhere else, you will always be restless.

lines.title: Measuring
lines.subtitle: Aligning your beliefs in the context of your life journey.
lines.text: You are alert to when and what you say and must be ready to talk your way out of trouble.

exaltation.advice: Your sensitivity to the mood of the moment indicates what can be easily communicated.

detriment.advice: Your confusion over what needs expressing can make it hard to assert yourself effectively.

lines.title: Storytelling
lines.subtitle: Drawing people to your tales and adventures.
lines.text: You are crystal clear in how you relate ideas of worth, or become vain and lose your way.

exaltation.advice: Finding an easy accord with others through your innovative abilities and descriptions.

detriment.advice: Your provocative manner demands expression and may relate a sense of unease to others.

lines.title: Re-examining
lines.subtitle: Assessing the boundaries of what is truthful.
lines.text: Your beliefs shape your perception of reality, bringing a certain quality of experiences.

exaltation.advice: You experience and speak out about your inner beliefs as your constantly shifting reality.

detriment.advice: Uncomfortable with any consistent beliefs you will deliberately confuse them.

lines.title: Remaining Calm
lines.subtitle: The biggest fuss usually hides the silliest things.
lines.text: You allow your intuition to penetrate through confusion, or become overwhelmed by chaos.

exaltation.advice: You perceive upsets to your sense of acoustic harmony without being distracted.

detriment.advice: You can be upset by chaotic situations, lose your intuitive ability and become indecisive.

lines.title: Infiltrating
lines.subtitle: Recognizing hidden agendas.
lines.text: Your intuition penetrates to meanings hidden from other senses, giving you to act nobly or not.

exaltation.advice: Your harmonic nature enriches your clarity and virtue as a matter of course.

detriment.advice: Your moodiness allows you to ignore any intuitive recognition of your baser motives.

lines.title: Being Aware
lines.subtitle: Sensitive vibrational attunement.
lines.text: Finding yourself immersed, even frozen sometimes in pure awareness.

exaltation.advice: You have the ability to attune to and relate to your perceptions of life from a pure intuition.

detriment.advice: Your deep intuitive gift sometimes takes you beyond reality and into fantasy.

lines.title: Being Fearless
lines.subtitle: Clear i tuition sees afar and must not succumb to fears.
lines.text: You attune deeply into your own and others’ lives through considering everybody’s needs.

exaltation.advice: You intuit and aligning to everyone’s ways and wants even before they are aware of them

detriment.advice: You act rashly on your intuition in directing others, sometimes treading on people’s toes.

lines.title: Being Gentle
lines.subtitle: Attuning to life’s situations moment by moment.
lines.text: You deliberately evaluate your intuition or forge ahead regardless and deal with the results.

exaltation.advice: You always recognize a direct connection between transformation and trusting intuition.

detriment.advice: Your moodiness can be overwhelmed by events causing you to overlook intuitive updates.

lines.title: Being Circumspect
lines.subtitle: Cubing the intuition to relevant issues are at hand.
lines.text: Your either have self-confidence or not, to trust in, and act on, what your intuition tells you.

exaltation.advice: Your have an anusual gift of intuiting things that cannot be discerned by other means.

detriment.advice: Your drive to act rashly comes from a fear that you are helpless to solve difficult situation.

lines.title: Harmonizing
lines.subtitle: Aligning your life with your spontaneous cheerful nature.
lines.text: By living in freedom from doubts and concern you bring joy to yourself and others.

exaltation.advice: When you access your inner harmony you pronome joy for one and all.

detriment.advice: Your changeable moods cycle through joy and sorrow quite naturally.

lines.title: Looking Onwards
lines.subtitle: Attunement to your inner joy attracts enjoyable activities.
lines.text: Your inner calm creates external joy, or you may just seek out thrills as a inmeans to escape.

exaltation.advice: You relish a harmonic balance between internal joy and external stimulations.

detriment.advice: Attracting the unusual you easily find activities that can lack apparently lasting values.

lines.title: Exciting
lines.subtitle: The draw of worldly enjoyments requires great inner selectivity.
lines.text: Intense excitement exists within you or is reflected through a promise of worldly pleasures.

exaltation.advice: Your innovative nature can give you great diversions that electrify your very core.

detriment.advice: Restless and fascinated by worldly delights you race from one distraction on another.

lines.title: Being Spontaneous
lines.subtitle: Quick recognition of joyful stimulations.
lines.text: You find strictly beneficial incentives or indulge everything and become drained of energy.

exaltation.advice: You are at home in diverse and dramatic circumstances identifying what really serves you.

detriment.advice: You may get lost in white stimulation to select and make choices that exhaust you.

lines.title: Being Discreet
lines.subtitle: Being clear in your inner needs and wants.
lines.text: You are either clear your associations or tend to trust everyone and end up being misled.

exaltation.advice: Your openness to others is tempered by your facility to watch out for yourself at all times.

detriment.advice: Your bright nature trusts everyone openly and is let down regularly if you are not careful.

lines.title: Attracting
lines.subtitle: Drawing to yourself all manner of stimulation.
lines.text: Being caught up in outer distractions as a way of life you are subjected to the whims of others.

exaltation.advice: If you link your inner world to outer stimulations you do not lose track of your own joy.

detriment.advice: The thrill of excitement is so strong that you can get lost in it and become wildly active.

lines.title: Penetrating
lines.subtitle: Evolution is only possible through interaction.
lines.text: You respond decisively to openings for interaction, or hesitate and miss your chance.

exaltation.advice: Your bright nature carries you through any doorway to intimacy.

detriment.advice: Finding complications in intimacy you become uncertain about when and how to interact.

lines.title: Joining in
lines.subtitle: An inner separation that can also open up to profound intimacies.
lines.text: Your inherent tendency to be separate eventually finds a way to be easy interrelating.

exaltation.advice: Your innovative, even anusual approach to intimacy assists others to evolve in their lives.

detriment.advice: Your deeply self-involved nature can often keep others at arm’s length.

lines.title: Connecting
lines.subtitle: Serving yourself and your world by triggering interaction.
lines.text: You are open to respond to all kinds of association and intimacies.

exaltation.advice: The sensible nature to find intimacy as a refreshment for your spirit.

detriment.advice: Actively seeking union and intimacy in any situation, sometimes being promiscuous.

lines.title: Being Friendly
lines.subtitle: Ao openness to being friendly with anyone.
lines.text: Your intimacy is founded in friendships that may become more and less intense over time.

exaltation.advice: You promote friendships that dissolve established barriers and transcend tradition.

detriment.advice: Confusing your intimacy roles you risk moving into needlessly intense involvement.

lines.title: Unifying
lines.subtitle: The gift of enlivening all interactions.
lines.text: Relating to the needs of others, you enhance intimacy through love, respect and sexuality.

exaltation.advice: You have the intense power to encourage everyone to find common accord and union.

detriment.advice: You innovatively dissolve intimacy barriers in yourself and others.

lines.title: Being Discerning
lines.subtitle: You are very particular in your intimacies.
lines.text: You develop a sense, over time, of how, what when and who suits you in your intimate life.

exaltation.advice: You find an inner recognition of the harmony you need to be intimately.

detriment.advice: You find one reason or another to limit yourself in realing profound intimacy.

lines.title: Accommodating
lines.subtitle: Trusting in your own dignity when under pressure.
lines.text: You conserve your strength and opinion when confronted by restraints, or become unsettled.

exaltation.advice: Your inner harmony recognizes the advantage of staying within self-imposed boundaries.

detriment.advice: You become restless and tense when you exaggerate your concern with external restraints.

lines.title: Finding Advantage
lines.subtitle: Knowing when restraints are unnecessarily limiting.
lines.text: You either seize the moment to act, or feel hopelessly held back and unable to move freely.

exaltation.advice: Your disciplined nature can adapt to restraints and still be ready to act.

detriment.advice: You identify with restraints to the point that you become indecisive and immobilized.

lines.title: Being Self-indulgent
lines.subtitle: Learning through exceeding your own sensible limits.
lines.text: Recognizing your limits you either restrain yourself, or you proceed rashly and pay the price.

exaltation.advice: You exercise discipline to restrain yourself when you know you have limited resources.

detriment.advice: You tend to seek attention and approval from others, disregarding your own genuine ideals.

lines.title: Extending
lines.subtitle: Using limitations as a natural springboard for growth.
lines.text: You effectively cope with all restraints,or become depressed when you cannot get your way.

exaltation.advice: You apply yourself to make the best of any situation by dealing with it directly.

detriment.advice: If you try to harmonize rather than surpass life’s limitations you can easily become dejected.

lines.title: Finding Inner-independence
lines.subtitle: Accepting any restrictions agreable has great effect.
lines.text: You live openly within acceptable restraints for yourself and others, or become hypocritical.

exaltation.advice: Your intuitive nature knows natural boundaries that are acceptable for yourself and others.

detriment.advice: Your expansive nature has trouble in defining appropriate bounds for yourself and others.

lines.title: Being Idealistic
lines.subtitle: Balancing between indulgence and unreasonable restraint.
lines.text: You know that any excessive restraints imposed on you and others will meet with resentment.

exaltation.advice: Your innovative approach to handling restraints makes them easier to accept.

detriment.advice: You become overwhelmed by imposed limitations and can find yourself depressed.

lines.title: Having Perception
lines.subtitle: Quietly allowing your psychic attunement.
lines.text: You have the means to probe deep into some of the inner workings of life.

exaltation.advice: Your mystical nature is attuned to be able to align many cosmic and earthly realities.

detriment.advice: If you are so keen to align with esoteric realms you lose touch with your everyday realities.

lines.title: Shining Light
lines.subtitle: Finding the thread of truth in anything.
lines.text: You either have the inner development to contain your compelling inspiration, or not.

exaltation.advice: You have the gift to inspire others through an attunement to your own clear well-being.

detriment.advice: You know that you shine brightly but have difficulty in handling others’ recognition of that.

lines.title: Remaining Inner-dependent
lines.subtitle: Staying true in your own life.
lines.text: You trust yourself in all interaction while acknowledging how easily you are affected by others.

exaltation.advice: You attune to all relationships that allow your truth and inspirations to flourish.

detriment.advice: It is easy for others to misunderstand you and you often find you have become estranged.

lines.title: Holding Higher Truth
lines.subtitle: Following your clarity to find resonant truth in others.
lines.text: You seek the truth in any situation whether you are inspired from within or from other people.

exaltation.advice: Your disciplined nature holds you in your process until truth is revealed, regardless…

detriment.advice: Any attempt to seek truth outside of yourself will result in you becoming disillusioned.

lines.title: Being Ingenious
lines.subtitle: Uniting everyone by interpreting truth innovatively.
lines.text: Abiding by your principles you impart truth to others, whether they accept it easily or not.

exaltation.advice: Your discipline and ingenuity to know the truth is unaffected if others embrace you or not.

detriment.advice: You insist on being accepted for your stance in life and your interpretations of truth.

lines.title: Being Insightful
lines.subtitle: Universal expressions of truth are not always recognized.
lines.text: Expressing your truth through personal experiences can inspire others practically or not.

exaltation.advice: Sincerely adapting your truth as a tangible reality has a great effect on others.

detriment.advice: You alienate others by pushing them to adopt your impractical grasp of truth.

lines.title: Being Practical
lines.subtitle: Proceeding toward what is attainable and aligner.
lines.text: If you confine yourself to essential details in life you are well prepared for many challengers.

exaltation.advice: Your gift of imagination will always enhance the potentially mundane aspects in your life.

detriment.advice: You express your plans as actions with the possibility of talking your way into trouble.

lines.title: Being Sensible
lines.subtitle: Reaching out to give and receive aid.
lines.text: You always find that needed assistance is available if you persevere diligently in your own way.

exaltation.advice: Staying with your process you give help when needed and receive help when it is offered.

detriment.advice: You have an anxiety that is hard to restrain when you consider yourself bound by traditions.

lines.title: Being Unassuming
lines.subtitle: Recognizing the need to downplay a tendency for overconfidence.
lines.text: Your good judgment, common sense and preparedness always prevail in difficult situations.

exaltation.advice: Innovation and conscientiousness allows you to find relevant details in all aspects of life.

detriment.advice: Imposing your need for harmony over everything else can cause your to act unreasonably.

lines.title: Being Patient
lines.subtitle: Being watchful for principled opportunities.
lines.text: You accept the need to be cautious especially in situations when you see yourself as right.

exaltation.advice: With your particular sensitivity you observe how life is enhanced by discreet interventions.

detriment.advice: Seeing ways to transform every area of life you puts for opportunities to be assertive.

lines.title: Being Considerate
lines.subtitle: Planning, preparation and performance.
lines.text: When everything is in place there comes a time of identifying when and how things proceed.

exaltation.advice: When you move steadily from one state to another you align details with outcomes.

detriment.advice: You are often ready to move on in life but continue to remain lost in your imagination.

lines.title: Accepting Limits
lines.subtitle: Recognizing practical limitations in all your endeavors.
lines.text: You need to exercise reserve if you are going to interact within the scope of your abilities.

exaltation.advice: You discipline yourself to remain clear in your intention when confronted by limits in life.

detriment.advice: You have the intellect to appreciate your limits, but often lack the intent to maintain them.

lines.title: Investigating
lines.subtitle: Constantly reviewing your circumstances.
lines.text: You either retain or lose your poise as the effects of your achievements become apparent.

exaltation.advice: You are not overly distracted by the pressures that accompany achievements.

detriment.advice: Continuously analyzing your life you still seem to chase unnecessary achievements.

lines.title: Being Reserved
lines.subtitle: Remaining steadfast in your life quest for personal integrity.
lines.text: You hold true to your aims through difficult times whether you impress others or not.

exaltation.advice: You can share your doubts with others while never letting go of your own inherent purpose.

detriment.advice: Being vulnerable in difficulties leads you sometimes to doubt your own and others’ purpose.

lines.title: Revitalizing
lines.subtitle: Considering high ideals in all matters.
lines.text: You eventually find out how to attain your goals and see who and what can help you.

exaltation.advice: The pressure to achieve compels you through profound doubts over your aims and allies.

detriment.advice: Something you are rigid with yourself and others when pursuing your objectives.

lines.title: Being Clear
lines.subtitle: Remaining alert for potential disturbances to your fulfillment.
lines.text: By describing your through processes to others you alleviate any doubts in a timely fashion.

exaltation.advice: You quickly anticipate any potential complications in life so that they are resolved easily.

detriment.advice: You can be overconfident in resolving problems and tend to make hasty decisions.

lines.title: Being Beneficent
lines.subtitle: Considering sincerity above showiness.
lines.text: Great achievements are possible if you candidly examine your doubts and actions on the way.

exaltation.advice: You implement a deliberately helpful plan while analyzing every aspect of your process.

detriment.advice: You might easily forget to have a heartfelt celebration when you complete your endeavors.

lines.title: Anticipating
lines.subtitle: When completing anything remain present and looking forwards.
lines.text: Dragging your mind out of past situations into the present is a lifelong awareness process.

exaltation.advice: You move on in life when you accept current resolutions and leave old doubts behind.

detriment.advice: YIf you insist on regurgitating old issues you will keep ‘spinning’ them in new ways.

lines.title: Transitioning
lines.subtitle: Inner resolve leads you towards fulfilling outcomes.
lines.text: Relying solely on past perspectives of your life experiences will not bring you fulfillment.

exaltation.advice: Your inner harmony gives patience and forbearance without promising satisfying outcomes.

detriment.advice: You are ready to act in any instant when things seem to be resolved, but often are not.

lines.title: Being Dedicated
lines.subtitle: Remaining true to your inner voice.
lines.text: Trusting in yourself and in your own process you find your clarity and make your moves.

exaltation.advice: Relying on your inner harmony you wait for an inner sense that precedes resolution.

detriment.advice: You attune with many aspects of life sometimes over-committing yourself unnecessarily.

lines.title: Reastating
lines.subtitle: Commencing anew when old ways no longer apply.
lines.text: You need to be clear from the outset in any endeavors any recognize who else has that clarity.

exaltation.advice: When you wait for renewed clarity and perception you deliberately transcend confusion.

detriment.advice: Being out of touch with the times you commit to strategies without fulfilling outcomes.

lines.title: Overcoming
lines.subtitle: All inner struggles require persistence and determination.
lines.text: You need inner principles to transcend confusion and clarity how you are going to proceed.

exaltation.advice: You review all cycles of life with a certainty that sooner or later you will find realization.

detriment.advice: With an overly energized mind you find that confusion never clears for very long.

lines.title: Being Exemplary
lines.subtitle: Constantly persistent, you shine brightly from an inner resolve.
lines.text: You realize that your inner light can be shone outwards to disperse other people’s confusion.

exaltation.advice: Your steadfast inner harmony reaches outwards to shed light on the world’s confusion.

detriment.advice: You see possibilities for clarification but tend to be overburdened by other’s confusion.

lines.title: Keeping Your Head
lines.subtitle: Remaining lucid in celebrating achievements.
lines.text: You celebrate with clarity or lapse into self-indulgence when confusion are resolved.

exaltation.advice: Your patient brilliance allows you to sort through any amount of chaos and find resolutions.

detriment.advice: You delight in embracing disorders but ultimately may get lost in the ensuing chaos.
